translations.ara: كم ساعة قضيت فيها بالبحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية؟
translations.en: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

questions.label: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو المبلغ الذي أنفقته في البحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية (بما في ذلك جميع النفقات، المواصلات، والطباعة، وشراء الصحف، وما إلى ذلك)، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

questions.label: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة
ما طريقة (طرق) البحث عن وظيفة التي استخدمتها في ال 30 يوماً الماضية؟
translations.en: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Specify other.
How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد طلبات العمل التي قمت بالتقديم لها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد مقابلات العمل التي قبت بها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد عروض العمل التي حصلت عليها خلال الـ 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Do you still have your wage job from the last time we followed up with you?

translations.ara: هل مازلت تشتغل بوظيفتك من آخر متابعة قمنا بها معك؟
translations.en: Do you still have your wage job from the last time we followed up with you?

questions.label: If you left your wage job, on what date did you leave?

translations.ara: إذا تركت وظيفتك بالراتب، في أي تاريخ تركت العمل؟
translations.en: If you left your wage job, on what date did you leave?

questions.label: Do you have a new wage job?

translations.en: Do you have a new wage job?

questions.label: Current Work
How did you hear about this job?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة

translations.en: How did you hear about this job?

questions.label: If through friends, these people are:

translations.ara: إذا كان من خلال الأصدقاء، فهؤلاء الأشخاص هم:
translations.en: If through friends, these people are:

questions.label: How was the hiring process?

options.label: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: تقديم السيرة الذاتية ومن ثم المقابلة بعد الإحالة للعمل عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل في موقع العمل بعد الاستعلام عنّي
translations.en: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

options.label: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي إلى الوظيفة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Social contact gave me the job directly

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي العمل مباشرة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (حصلت على العمل عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Social contact gave me the job directly

options.label: Given the job directly at the work site

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي الوظيفة في موقع العمل مباشرة
translations.en: Given the job directly at the work site

options.label: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

translations.ara: عقد اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي للعمل من قبل مدرستي جامعتي / كليتي)
translations.en: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

questions.label: When did you start this job?

translations.en: When did you start this job?

questions.label: What is your firm's or organization's name?

translations.en: What is your firm's or organization's name?

questions.label: In what city is this job located?

translations.ara: في أي مدينة تقع هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: In what city is this job located?

questions.label: What is the most appropriate job desciption?

translations.ara: مهني في مجال الصحة (عل سبيل المثال طبيب)

options.label: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker

translations.ara: عامل تحضير و تقديم الطعام (على سبيل المثال مطعم)
translations.en: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker
What is the most appropriate job desciption?

questions.label: Within production, what is the most appropriate job description?

translations.ara: مشرف على عمال الإنتاج - شركة صناعة
عمال تحميل و تنزيل - شركة صناعة
سائق أو ناقل مواد - شركة صناعة
في مجال الإنتاج ، ما هو الوصف الوظيفي الأنسب؟
translations.en: Within production, what is the most appropriate job description?

questions.label: What are the terms of this employment?

translations.en: What are the terms of this employment?

questions.label: Specify other.
What is the sector of this job?

translations.en: What is the sector of this job?

questions.label: What type of employer is this job with?

options.label: Joint venture between government and private firm

translations.ara: مشروع مشترك بين الحكومة وشركة خاصة
translations.en: Joint venture between government and private firm

options.label: Joint venture between domestic and foreign firm

translations.ara: مشروع مشترك بين شركة محلية وأجنبية
translations.en: Joint venture between domestic and foreign firm
What type of employer is this job with?

questions.label: How many permanent employees does this firm or organisation have?

translations.ara: كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين لدى هذه الشركة أو المؤسسة؟
translations.en: How many permanent employees does this firm or organisation have?

questions.label: Where do you do this work?

translations.en: Where do you do this work?

questions.label: Specify other.
Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

translations.ara: يرجى تحديد وسيلة المواصلات التي تستخدمها للوصول إلى هذه الوظيفة.
translations.en: Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

questions.label: Specify other.
Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما مدى بعد هذه الوظيفة عن المنزل (بالدقائق)؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

questions.label: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما تكلفة المواصلات من البيت الى العمل؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

questions.label: How many hours do you work in this job on a typical weekday?

translations.ara: كم ساعة تعمل في هذا العمل في اليوم العادي؟
translations.en: How many hours do you work in this job on a typical weekday?

questions.label: How many days do you work in this job in a typical week?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأيام التي تعمل فيها في هذا العمل في أسبوع عادي؟
translations.en: How many days do you work in this job in a typical week?

questions.label: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

translations.ara: ما هو راتبك أو أجرك الشهري لهذه الوظيفة، قبل الضرائب؟
translations.en: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

questions.label: What benefits has your employer/firm offered you?

translations.ara: ما هي الفوائد (المزايا) التي قدمها لك صاحب العمل / الشركة؟
translations.en: What benefits has your employer/firm offered you?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did the employer/firm provide you with a work permit?

translations.ara: هل قام صاحب العمل /الشركة بتأمينك بتصريح عمل؟
translations.en: Did the employer/firm provide you with a work permit?

questions.label: What is the status of your work permit?

translations.ara: غير خاص بصاحب العمل و الوظيفة

translations.en: What is the status of your work permit?

questions.label: Are you facing any challenges with this job?

options.label: The job is exhausting and straining

translations.en: The job is exhausting and straining

options.label: The employer is not easy to work with

translations.ara: ليس من السهل التعامل مع صاحب العمل
translations.en: The employer is not easy to work with

options.label: The other employees are not easy to work with

translations.ara: ليس من السهل التعامل مع الموظفين الآخرين
translations.en: The other employees are not easy to work with

options.label: The job doesn't offer enough benefits

translations.en: The job doesn't offer enough benefits

options.label: The skill level is too high

translations.en: The skill level is too high

options.label: The skill level is too low

translations.en: The skill level is too low

options.label: Employer didn't provide me with a work permit

translations.ara: لم يأمن لي صاحب العمل تصريح عمل
translations.en: Employer didn't provide me with a work permit

options.label: I cannot cover transportation costs to work

translations.ara: لا أقدر أن اغطي تكاليف المواصلات للعمل
translations.en: I cannot cover transportation costs to work

options.label: I cannot cover the costs of childcare

translations.ara: لا أقدر أن تكاليف الرعاية على أطفالي
translations.en: I cannot cover the costs of childcare

translations.ara: هل تواجه أي تحديات في هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: Are you facing any challenges with this job?

questions.label: Specify other.
Do you still own your business from the last time we followed up with you?

translations.ara: هل ما زلت تمتلك شركتك أو عملك الماضي من آخر متابعة قمنا بها معك؟
translations.en: Do you still own your business from the last time we followed up with you?

questions.label: On what date did you stop the business?

translations.ara: في أي تاريج وقفت شركتك أو عملك الخاص؟
translations.en: On what date did you stop the business?

questions.label: Do you have a new business that we did not ask you about during the last interview?

translations.ara: هل تملك شركة أو عمل خاص جديد لم نسألك عنه خلال المقابلة السابقة؟
translations.en: Do you have a new business that we did not ask you about during the last interview?

questions.label: Current Business
When did you start this business?

translations.ara: متى بدأت شركتك أو عملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: When did you start this business?

questions.label: In what sector is this business?

translations.ara: في أي قطاع صناعي تقع شركتك أوعملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: In what sector is this business?

questions.label: Is this business legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

translations.ara: هل هذا العمل الخاص مسجل رسميا و قانونيا (هل هي مسجلة لضرائب القيمة المضافة (VAT))؟
translations.en: Is this business legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

questions.label: How are you paid in this business?

options.label: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

translations.ara: أدفع لنفسى راتب شهري ثابت من الأرباح الشهرية.
translations.en: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

options.label: I receive money from my customers.

translations.en: I receive money from my customers.

options.label: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.en: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.ara: كيف تستلم أجورك من هذا العمل؟
translations.en: How are you paid in this business?

questions.label: What was this amount last month?

translations.ara: كم كان هذا المبلغ الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: What was this amount last month?

questions.label: For the previous month...
Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

translations.ara: بالنظر إلى تكاليف راتبك و أية تكاليف أخرى، ما هو إجمالي نفقات عملك في الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

questions.label: What were the total monthly sales of your business? Include sales of services

translations.ara: ما هو إجمالي المبيعات الشهرية لشركتك؟ تشمل مبيعات الخدمات
translations.en: What were the total monthly sales of your business? Include sales of services

questions.label: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits)?

translations.ara: بعد دفع جميع النفقات، ما هو دخل الشركة (الأرباح)؟
translations.en: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits)?

questions.label: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

translations.ara: كم عدد الشركات الذي تعمل بفس نطاق عملك والتي تقع في منطقتكم (على بعد خمس دقائق سيراً على الأقدام)؟
translations.en: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

questions.label: Where is your most important competitor located?

options.label: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، ولكن في نفس الحي
translations.en: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

options.label: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، في حي مختلف ولكن في نفس المدينة
translations.en: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city
Where is your most important competitor located?

questions.label: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

translations.ara: باستثنائك، كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين في شركتك؟
translations.en: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك بشراء البضائع (مثل عناصر الإنتاج، الأثاث، المعدات) مباشرة من دولة أخرى بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك ببيع السلع أو الخدمات لمواطني الدول الأجنبية (على سبيل المثال عن طريق تصدير المنتجات، أو عن طريق البيع للسياح/المغتربين في الأردن) بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

questions.label: Have you recieved any form of cash assistance from us?

translations.ara: هل أستلمت مساعدات مالية من قبلنا؟
translations.en: Have you recieved any form of cash assistance from us?

questions.label: Cash Usage
Have you spent any of the cash assistance you received (either some or all of it)?

translations.ara: هل صرفت المبلغ من المالي الذي قمت بسحبه (إما بعضها أو كلها)؟
translations.en: Have you spent any of the cash assistance you received (either some or all of it)?

questions.label: If yes, how much?
In how many days did spend the amount you withdrew?

translations.ara: في كم يوماً صرفت المبلغ الذي سحبته؟
translations.en: In how many days did spend the amount you withdrew?

questions.label: How did you spend the cash?

translations.en: How did you spend the cash?

questions.label: Do you think that the value of the cash transfer was helpful in general?

translations.ara: هل تعتقد أن قيمة المبلغ المالي كان مفيد لك؟
translations.en: Do you think that the value of the cash transfer was helpful in general?

questions.label: Why  was it helpful?
Why was it not helpful?
Who in the household benefitted the most from the cash, why?

translations.ara: أي من افراد اسرتك استفاد من المبلغ المالي؟
translations.en: Who in the household benefitted the most from the cash, why?

questions.label: Household Expenditure Patterns
Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money first on a monthly basis and then on a weekly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: اسأل المشتركين حول كيفية إنفاق أموالهم على أساس شهري. يمكن للمشتركين تقدير الإنفاق هنا.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money first on a monthly basis and then on a weekly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

questions.label: In the last MONTH, how much did your household pay on the following either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

translations.ara: خلال الشر الماضي، كم دفعت أسرتك على الأشياء التالية لك أو لعائلتك أو لأصدقائك أو للآخرين؟ (بالدينار الأردني)
translations.en: In the last MONTH, how much did your household pay on the following either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

questions.label: Food and drink
Rent/housing
Electricity/gas
Water
Healthcare
Education
Transportation
Communication (eg. mobile phone credit/internet)

translations.ara: الاتصال (على سبيل المثال ، رصيد الهاتف المحمول / الإنترنت)

questions.label: Debt repayment
Household goods (soap, cleaning, etc)
Coffee, cigarettes, shisha/argeela
Spending on other things
In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

translations.ara: المساعدات المالية عن طريق المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمات الدولية

options.label: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: التحويلات من ألأسرة أو ألأصحاب خارج البلد
translations.en: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: في الأيام السبعة الماضية، ما كان مصدر الدخل الرئيسي للأموال التي أنفقتها؟
translations.en: In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

questions.label: Specify other.
Refugee Integration

ESO SCRIPT: Please respond to the following questions with Strongly Agree, Generally Agree, Neither Agree nor Disagree, Generally Disagree, Strongly Disagree. If you do not remember these options, I can repeat them to you at any time.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى الإجابة على الأسئلة التالية بأوافق بشدة، أوافق بشكل عام، لا أوافق أو أعارض، أعارض بشكل عام، أعارض بشدة. إن كنت لا تتذكر هذه الخيارات، فيمكنني تكرارها لك في أي وقت.
translations.en: ESO SCRIPT: Please respond to the following questions with Strongly Agree, Generally Agree, Neither Agree nor Disagree, Generally Disagree, Strongly Disagree. If you do not remember these options, I can repeat them to you at any time.

questions.label: I feel connected to Jordan
I have just as many opportunities to find formal work as my Jordanian neighbours

translations.ara: لدي نفس  الفرص لإيجاد عمل رسمي مثل جيراني الأردنيين
translations.en: I have just as many opportunities to find formal work as my Jordanian neighbours

questions.label: I would be treated the same as my Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job

translations.ara: سأعامل نفس معاملت  زملائي الأردنيين في وظيفة مدفوعة الأجر
translations.en: I would be treated the same as my Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job

questions.label: In this country, I have the knowledge, skills and resources I need to search for a job

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، لدي المعرفة و الوالمهارات والمصادر التي أحتاجها للبحث عن عمل
translations.en: In this country, I have the knowledge, skills and resources I need to search for a job

questions.label: I often attend community meetings, sports or other similar events, with a mix of Jordanians and refugees

translations.ara: غالبا ما أحضر اجتماعات مجتمعية أو رياضية أو أحداث أخرى مماثلة بوجود خليط من الأردنيين و اللاجئين
translations.en: I often attend community meetings, sports or other similar events, with a mix of Jordanians and refugees

questions.label: I am permitted to access health care services for me and my family just as easily as our Jordanian neighbours

translations.ara: يسمح لي و لعائلتي الوصول الى خدمات الرعاية الصحية بنفس سهولة وصول جيراننا الأردنيين لها
translations.en: I am permitted to access health care services for me and my family just as easily as our Jordanian neighbours

questions.label: In this country, I am able to get help for legal problems

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، يمكنني الحصول على المساعدة بخصوص المشاكل القانونية
translations.en: In this country, I am able to get help for legal problems

questions.label: Positive Mood

ESO script: Next I would like to ask you four questions about your feelings on aspects of your life. There are no right or wrong answers. For each of these questions I’d like you to give an answer on a scale of 0 to 10, where 0 is “not at all” and 10 is “completely”.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: نود أن نطرح عليك أربعة أسئلة عن مشاعرك حول جوانب معينة في حياتك. لا توجد اجابات صحيحة أو خاطئة. لكل سؤال، أود منك تقديم اجابة على مقياس من 0 الي 10، حيث أن الرقم 0 يدل على اجابة "على الاطلاق" و 10 يدل على اجابة "كليا."
translations.en: ESO script: Next I would like to ask you four questions about your feelings on aspects of your life. There are no right or wrong answers. For each of these questions I’d like you to give an answer on a scale of 0 to 10, where 0 is “not at all” and 10 is “completely”.

questions.label: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?

translations.ara: بشكل عام، ما مدى رضاك عن حياتك هذه الأيام؟
translations.en: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?

questions.label: Overall, to what extent do you feel that the things you do in your life are worthwhile?

translations.ara: بشكل عام، الأي مدى تشعر أن الأشياء التي تقوم بها في حياتك جديرة بالأهتمام؟
translations.en: Overall, to what extent do you feel that the things you do in your life are worthwhile?

questions.label: Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday?

translations.ara: بشكل عام ما مدى شعورك بالسعادة بالأمس؟
translations.en: Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday?

questions.label: On a scale where 0 is “not at all anxious” and 10 is “completely anxious”, overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday?

translations.ara: على مقياس من 0-10 حيث 0 "لست قلقاً على الاطلاق" و 10 قلق تمامًا"، بشكل عام، ما مدى قلقك بالأمس؟
translations.en: On a scale where 0 is “not at all anxious” and 10 is “completely anxious”, overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday?

questions.label: Exit and Follow-up
Do you have a new contact number?

translations.en: Do you have a new contact number?

questions.label: Contact mobile number
Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي أفكار أو أسئلة إضافية لديك لمساعدتنا على تحسين هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

Identifying Information
Instructions for ESO: Please complete this section before you start the interview with the respondent.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى إكمال هذا القسم قبل بدء المقابلة مع المشترك.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Please complete this section before you start the interview with the respondent.

questions.label: ESO ID
GPS coordinate
Type of follow-up
Interview date
Interview start time
Please indicate which follow-up this is for this jobseeker.

translations.ara: يرجى الإشارة على رقم المتابعة الذي تقوم بها الان لهذا الباحث عن عمل.
translations.en: Please indicate which follow-up this is for this jobseeker.

questions.label: Are you able to reach this jobseeker?

translations.ara: هل تستطيع التواصل مع هذا الباحث عن العمل؟
translations.en: Are you able to reach this jobseeker?

questions.label: Are you still searching for work and interested in continuing in this job match service?

translations.ara: هل ما زلت تبحث عن عمل و تريد أن تستمر في خدمة التوظيف هذه؟
translations.en: Are you still searching for work and interested in continuing in this job match service?

questions.label: Background Information
ESO instructions: I will now ask about your marital status, children, and income.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الأن عن حالتك الاجتماعية، الأطفال، والدخل.
translations.en: ESO instructions: I will now ask about your marital status, children, and income.

questions.label: What is your marital status?
How many children do you have?

translations.en: How many children do you have?

questions.label: What is your HOUSEHOLD's average monthly income, in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​الدخل الشهري لأسرتك، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: What is your HOUSEHOLD's average monthly income, in JOD?

questions.label: What is your PERSONAL average monthly income, in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​دخلك الشهري، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: What is your PERSONAL average monthly income, in JOD?

questions.label: Job Search
Instructions for ESO: These questions are about most recent job search behavior for a wage paying job.

translations.ara: إرشادات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذه الأسئلة تدور حول أحدث طريقة اتخذها المشترك للبحث عن وظيفة براتب أو أجر.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: These questions are about most recent job search behavior for a wage paying job.

questions.label: Did you actively search for a job in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: هل بحثت بنشاط عن وظيفة خلال ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: Did you actively search for a job in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

translations.ara: كم ساعة قضيت فيها بالبحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية؟
translations.en: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

questions.label: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو المبلغ الذي أنفقته في البحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية (بما في ذلك جميع النفقات، المواصلات، والطباعة، وشراء الصحف، وما إلى ذلك)، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

questions.label: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة
ما طريقة (طرق) البحث عن وظيفة التي استخدمتها في ال 30 يوماً الماضية؟
translations.en: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Specify other.
How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد طلبات العمل التي قمت بالتقديم لها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد مقابلات العمل التي قبت بها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد عروض العمل التي حصلت عليها خلال الـ 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Do you still have your wage job from the last time we followed up with you?

translations.ara: هل مازلت تشتغل بوظيفتك من آخر متابعة قمنا بها معك؟
translations.en: Do you still have your wage job from the last time we followed up with you?

questions.label: If you left your wage job, on what date did you leave?

translations.ara: إذا تركت وظيفتك بالراتب، في أي تاريخ تركت العمل؟
translations.en: If you left your wage job, on what date did you leave?

questions.label: Do you have a new wage job?

translations.en: Do you have a new wage job?

questions.label: Current Work
How did you hear about this job?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة

translations.en: How did you hear about this job?

questions.label: If through friends, these people are:

translations.ara: إذا كان من خلال الأصدقاء، فهؤلاء الأشخاص هم:
translations.en: If through friends, these people are:

questions.label: How was the hiring process?

options.label: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: تقديم السيرة الذاتية ومن ثم المقابلة بعد الإحالة للعمل عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل في موقع العمل بعد الاستعلام عنّي
translations.en: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

options.label: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي إلى الوظيفة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Social contact gave me the job directly

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي العمل مباشرة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (حصلت على العمل عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Social contact gave me the job directly

options.label: Given the job directly at the work site

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي الوظيفة في موقع العمل مباشرة
translations.en: Given the job directly at the work site

options.label: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

translations.ara: عقد اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي للعمل من قبل مدرستي جامعتي / كليتي)
translations.en: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

questions.label: When did you start this job?

translations.en: When did you start this job?

questions.label: What is your firm's or organization's name?

translations.en: What is your firm's or organization's name?

questions.label: In what city is this job located?

translations.ara: في أي مدينة تقع هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: In what city is this job located?

questions.label: What is the most appropriate job desciption?

translations.ara: مهني في مجال الصحة (عل سبيل المثال طبيب)

options.label: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker

translations.ara: عامل تحضير و تقديم الطعام (على سبيل المثال مطعم)
translations.en: Food preparation and service (eg. restaurant) worker
What is the most appropriate job desciption?

questions.label: Within production, what is the most appropriate job description?

translations.ara: مشرف على عمال الإنتاج - شركة صناعة
عمال تحميل و تنزيل - شركة صناعة
سائق أو ناقل مواد - شركة صناعة
في مجال الإنتاج ، ما هو الوصف الوظيفي الأنسب؟
translations.en: Within production, what is the most appropriate job description?

questions.label: What are the terms of this employment?

translations.en: What are the terms of this employment?

questions.label: Specify other.
What is the sector of this job?

translations.en: What is the sector of this job?

questions.label: What type of employer is this job with?

options.label: Joint venture between government and private firm

translations.ara: مشروع مشترك بين الحكومة وشركة خاصة
translations.en: Joint venture between government and private firm

options.label: Joint venture between domestic and foreign firm

translations.ara: مشروع مشترك بين شركة محلية وأجنبية
translations.en: Joint venture between domestic and foreign firm
What type of employer is this job with?

questions.label: How many permanent employees does this firm or organisation have?

translations.ara: كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين لدى هذه الشركة أو المؤسسة؟
translations.en: How many permanent employees does this firm or organisation have?

questions.label: Where do you do this work?

translations.en: Where do you do this work?

questions.label: Specify other.
Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

translations.ara: يرجى تحديد وسيلة المواصلات التي تستخدمها للوصول إلى هذه الوظيفة.
translations.en: Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

questions.label: Specify other.
Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما مدى بعد هذه الوظيفة عن المنزل (بالدقائق)؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

questions.label: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما تكلفة المواصلات من البيت الى العمل؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

questions.label: How many hours do you work in this job on a typical weekday?

translations.ara: كم ساعة تعمل في هذا العمل في اليوم العادي؟
translations.en: How many hours do you work in this job on a typical weekday?

questions.label: How many days do you work in this job in a typical week?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأيام التي تعمل فيها في هذا العمل في أسبوع عادي؟
translations.en: How many days do you work in this job in a typical week?

questions.label: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

translations.ara: ما هو راتبك أو أجرك الشهري لهذه الوظيفة، قبل الضرائب؟
translations.en: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

questions.label: What benefits has your employer/firm offered you?

translations.ara: ما هي الفوائد (المزايا) التي قدمها لك صاحب العمل / الشركة؟
translations.en: What benefits has your employer/firm offered you?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did the employer/firm provide you with a work permit?

translations.ara: هل قام صاحب العمل /الشركة بتأمينك بتصريح عمل؟
translations.en: Did the employer/firm provide you with a work permit?

questions.label: What is the status of your work permit?

translations.ara: غير خاص بصاحب العمل و الوظيفة

translations.en: What is the status of your work permit?

questions.label: Are you facing any challenges with this job?

options.label: The job is exhausting and straining

translations.en: The job is exhausting and straining

options.label: The employer is not easy to work with

translations.ara: ليس من السهل التعامل مع صاحب العمل
translations.en: The employer is not easy to work with

options.label: The other employees are not easy to work with

translations.ara: ليس من السهل التعامل مع الموظفين الآخرين
translations.en: The other employees are not easy to work with

options.label: The job doesn't offer enough benefits

translations.en: The job doesn't offer enough benefits

options.label: The skill level is too high

translations.en: The skill level is too high

options.label: The skill level is too low

translations.en: The skill level is too low

options.label: Employer didn't provide me with a work permit

translations.ara: لم يأمن لي صاحب العمل تصريح عمل
translations.en: Employer didn't provide me with a work permit

options.label: I cannot cover transportation costs to work

translations.ara: لا أقدر أن اغطي تكاليف المواصلات للعمل
translations.en: I cannot cover transportation costs to work

options.label: I cannot cover the costs of childcare

translations.ara: لا أقدر أن تكاليف الرعاية على أطفالي
translations.en: I cannot cover the costs of childcare

translations.ara: هل تواجه أي تحديات في هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: Are you facing any challenges with this job?

questions.label: Specify other.
Do you still own your business from the last time we followed up with you?

translations.ara: هل ما زلت تمتلك شركتك أو عملك الماضي من آخر متابعة قمنا بها معك؟
translations.en: Do you still own your business from the last time we followed up with you?

questions.label: On what date did you stop the business?

translations.ara: في أي تاريج وقفت شركتك أو عملك الخاص؟
translations.en: On what date did you stop the business?

questions.label: Do you have a new business that we did not ask you about during the last interview?

translations.ara: هل تملك شركة أو عمل خاص جديد لم نسألك عنه خلال المقابلة السابقة؟
translations.en: Do you have a new business that we did not ask you about during the last interview?

questions.label: Current Business
When did you start this business?

translations.ara: متى بدأت شركتك أو عملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: When did you start this business?

questions.label: In what sector is this business?

translations.ara: في أي قطاع صناعي تقع شركتك أوعملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: In what sector is this business?

questions.label: Is this business legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

translations.ara: هل هذا العمل الخاص مسجل رسميا و قانونيا (هل هي مسجلة لضرائب القيمة المضافة (VAT))؟
translations.en: Is this business legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

questions.label: How are you paid in this business?

options.label: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

translations.ara: أدفع لنفسى راتب شهري ثابت من الأرباح الشهرية.
translations.en: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

options.label: I receive money from my customers.

translations.en: I receive money from my customers.

options.label: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.en: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.ara: كيف تستلم أجورك من هذا العمل؟
translations.en: How are you paid in this business?

questions.label: What was this amount last month?

translations.ara: كم كان هذا المبلغ الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: What was this amount last month?

questions.label: For the previous month...
Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

translations.ara: بالنظر إلى تكاليف راتبك و أية تكاليف أخرى، ما هو إجمالي نفقات عملك في الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

questions.label: What were the total monthly sales of your business? Include sales of services

translations.ara: ما هو إجمالي المبيعات الشهرية لشركتك؟ تشمل مبيعات الخدمات
translations.en: What were the total monthly sales of your business? Include sales of services

questions.label: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits)?

translations.ara: بعد دفع جميع النفقات، ما هو دخل الشركة (الأرباح)؟
translations.en: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits)?

questions.label: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

translations.ara: كم عدد الشركات الذي تعمل بفس نطاق عملك والتي تقع في منطقتكم (على بعد خمس دقائق سيراً على الأقدام)؟
translations.en: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

questions.label: Where is your most important competitor located?

options.label: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، ولكن في نفس الحي
translations.en: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

options.label: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، في حي مختلف ولكن في نفس المدينة
translations.en: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city
Where is your most important competitor located?

questions.label: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

translations.ara: باستثنائك، كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين في شركتك؟
translations.en: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك بشراء البضائع (مثل عناصر الإنتاج، الأثاث، المعدات) مباشرة من دولة أخرى بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك ببيع السلع أو الخدمات لمواطني الدول الأجنبية (على سبيل المثال عن طريق تصدير المنتجات، أو عن طريق البيع للسياح/المغتربين في الأردن) بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

questions.label: Did you recieve any form of cash assistance from us?

translations.ara: هل أستلمت مساعدات مالية من قبلنا؟
translations.en: Did you recieve any form of cash assistance from us?

questions.label: Cash Usage
Have you spent any of the cash assistance you received (either some or all of it)?

translations.ara: هل صرفت المبلغ من المالي الذي قمت بسحبه (إما بعضها أو كلها)؟
translations.en: Have you spent any of the cash assistance you received (either some or all of it)?

questions.label: If yes, how much?
In how many days did spend the amount you withdrew?

translations.ara: في كم يوماً صرفت المبلغ الذي سحبته؟
translations.en: In how many days did spend the amount you withdrew?

questions.label: How did you spend the cash?

translations.en: How did you spend the cash?

questions.label: Do you think that the value of the cash transfer was helpful in general?

translations.ara: هل تعتقد أن قيمة المبلغ المالي كان مفيد لك؟
translations.en: Do you think that the value of the cash transfer was helpful in general?

questions.label: Why  was it helpful?
Why was it not helpful?
Who in the household benefitted the most from the cash, why?

translations.ara: أي من افراد اسرتك استفاد من المبلغ المالي؟
translations.en: Who in the household benefitted the most from the cash, why?

questions.label: Household Expenditure Patterns
Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money first on a monthly basis and then on a weekly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: اسأل المشتركين حول كيفية إنفاق أموالهم على أساس شهري. يمكن للمشتركين تقدير الإنفاق هنا.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money first on a monthly basis and then on a weekly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

questions.label: In the last MONTH, how much did your household pay on the following either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

translations.ara: خلال الشر الماضي، كم دفعت أسرتك على الأشياء التالية لك أو لعائلتك أو لأصدقائك أو للآخرين؟ (بالدينار الأردني)
translations.en: In the last MONTH, how much did your household pay on the following either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

questions.label: Food and drink
Rent/housing
Electricity/gas
Water
Healthcare
Education
Transportation
Communication (eg. mobile phone credit/internet)

translations.ara: الاتصال (على سبيل المثال ، رصيد الهاتف المحمول / الإنترنت)

questions.label: Debt repayment
Household goods (soap, cleaning, etc)
Coffee, cigarettes, shisha/argeela
Spending on other things
In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

translations.ara: المساعدات المالية عن طريق المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمات الدولية

options.label: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: التحويلات من ألأسرة أو ألأصحاب خارج البلد
translations.en: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: في الأيام السبعة الماضية، ما كان مصدر الدخل الرئيسي للأموال التي أنفقتها؟
translations.en: In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

questions.label: Specify other.
Refugee Integration

ESO SCRIPT: Please respond to the following questions with Strongly Agree, Generally Agree, Neither Agree nor Disagree, Generally Disagree, Strongly Disagree. If you do not remember these options, I can repeat them to you at any time.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى الإجابة على الأسئلة التالية بأوافق بشدة، أوافق بشكل عام، لا أوافق أو أعارض، أعارض بشكل عام، أعارض بشدة. إن كنت لا تتذكر هذه الخيارات، فيمكنني تكرارها لك في أي وقت.
translations.en: ESO SCRIPT: Please respond to the following questions with Strongly Agree, Generally Agree, Neither Agree nor Disagree, Generally Disagree, Strongly Disagree. If you do not remember these options, I can repeat them to you at any time.

questions.label: I feel connected to Jordan
I have just as many opportunities to find formal work as my Jordanian neighbours

translations.ara: لدي نفس  الفرص لإيجاد عمل رسمي مثل جيراني الأردنيين
translations.en: I have just as many opportunities to find formal work as my Jordanian neighbours

questions.label: I would be treated the same as my Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job

translations.ara: سأعامل نفس معاملت  زملائي الأردنيين في وظيفة مدفوعة الأجر
translations.en: I would be treated the same as my Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job

questions.label: In this country, I have the knowledge, skills and resources I need to search for a job

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، لدي المعرفة و الوالمهارات والمصادر التي أحتاجها للبحث عن عمل
translations.en: In this country, I have the knowledge, skills and resources I need to search for a job

questions.label: I often attend community meetings, sports or other similar events, with a mix of Jordanians and refugees

translations.ara: غالبا ما أحضر اجتماعات مجتمعية أو رياضية أو أحداث أخرى مماثلة بوجود خليط من الأردنيين و اللاجئين
translations.en: I often attend community meetings, sports or other similar events, with a mix of Jordanians and refugees

questions.label: I am permitted to access health care services for me and my family just as easily as our Jordanian neighbours

translations.ara: يسمح لي و لعائلتي الوصول الى خدمات الرعاية الصحية بنفس سهولة وصول جيراننا الأردنيين لها
translations.en: I am permitted to access health care services for me and my family just as easily as our Jordanian neighbours

questions.label: In this country, I am able to get help for legal problems

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، يمكنني الحصول على المساعدة بخصوص المشاكل القانونية
translations.en: In this country, I am able to get help for legal problems

questions.label: Positive Mood

ESO script: Next I would like to ask you four questions about your feelings on aspects of your life. There are no right or wrong answers. For each of these questions I’d like you to give an answer on a scale of 0 to 10, where 0 is “not at all” and 10 is “completely”.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: نود أن نطرح عليك أربعة أسئلة عن مشاعرك حول جوانب معينة في حياتك. لا توجد اجابات صحيحة أو خاطئة. لكل سؤال، أود منك تقديم اجابة على مقياس من 0 الي 10، حيث أن الرقم 0 يدل على اجابة "على الاطلاق" و 10 يدل على اجابة "كليا."
translations.en: ESO script: Next I would like to ask you four questions about your feelings on aspects of your life. There are no right or wrong answers. For each of these questions I’d like you to give an answer on a scale of 0 to 10, where 0 is “not at all” and 10 is “completely”.

questions.label: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?

translations.ara: بشكل عام، ما مدى رضاك عن حياتك هذه الأيام؟
translations.en: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?

questions.label: Overall, to what extent do you feel that the things you do in your life are worthwhile?

translations.ara: بشكل عام، الأي مدى تشعر أن الأشياء التي تقوم بها في حياتك جديرة بالأهتمام؟
translations.en: Overall, to what extent do you feel that the things you do in your life are worthwhile?

questions.label: Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday?

translations.ara: بشكل عام ما مدى شعورك بالسعادة بالأمس؟
translations.en: Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday?

questions.label: On a scale where 0 is “not at all anxious” and 10 is “completely anxious”, overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday?

translations.ara: على مقياس من 0-10 حيث 0 "لست قلقاً على الاطلاق" و 10 قلق تمامًا"، بشكل عام، ما مدى قلقك بالأمس؟
translations.en: On a scale where 0 is “not at all anxious” and 10 is “completely anxious”, overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday?

questions.label: Exit and Follow-up
Do you have a new contact number?

translations.en: Do you have a new contact number?

questions.label: Contact mobile number
Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي أفكار أو أسئلة إضافية لديك لمساعدتنا على تحسين هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

#form/cj/cjtrans_specify_other
#form/cj/cjterms_specify_other

Identifying Information
Instructions for ESO: Please complete this section before you start the interview with the respondent.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى إكمال هذا القسم قبل بدء المقابلة مع المشترك.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Please complete this section before you start the interview with the respondent.

questions.label: ESO ID
GPS coordinate
Type of follow-up
Interview date
Interview start time
Are you able to reach this jobseeker?

translations.ara: هل تستطيع التواصل مع هذا الباحث عن العمل؟
translations.en: Are you able to reach this jobseeker?

questions.label: Are you still searching for work and interested in continuing in this job match service?

translations.ara: هل ما زلت تبحث عن عمل و تريد أن تستمر في خدمة التوظيف هذه؟
translations.en: Are you still searching for work and interested in continuing in this job match service?

questions.label: Background Information
ESO instructions: I will now ask about your marital status, children, and income.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الأن عن حالتك الاجتماعية، الأطفال، والدخل.
translations.en: ESO instructions: I will now ask about your marital status, children, and income.

questions.label: What is your marital status?
How many children do you have?

translations.en: How many children do you have?

questions.label: What is your HOUSEHOLD's average monthly income, in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​الدخل الشهري لأسرتك، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: What is your HOUSEHOLD's average monthly income, in JOD?

questions.label: What is your PERSONAL average monthly income, in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​دخلك الشهري، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: What is your PERSONAL average monthly income, in JOD?

questions.label: Job Search
Instructions for ESO: These questions are about most recent job search behavior for a wage paying job.

translations.ara: إرشادات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذه الأسئلة تدور حول أحدث طريقة اتخذها المشترك للبحث عن وظيفة براتب أو أجر.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: These questions are about most recent job search behavior for a wage paying job.

questions.label: Did you actively search for a job in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: هل بحثت بنشاط عن وظيفة خلال ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: Did you actively search for a job in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

translations.ara: كم ساعة قضيت فيها بالبحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية؟
translations.en: How many hours did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days?

questions.label: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

translations.ara: ما هو المبلغ الذي أنفقته في البحث عن وظيفة في ال 7 أيام الماضية (بما في ذلك جميع النفقات، المواصلات، والطباعة، وشراء الصحف، وما إلى ذلك)، بالدينار الأردني؟
translations.en: How much money did you spend searching for a job in the last 7 days (including all expenses, transportation, printing, newspaper buying, etc.), in JOD?

questions.label: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة
ما طريقة (طرق) البحث عن وظيفة التي استخدمتها في ال 30 يوماً الماضية؟
translations.en: Which method(s) of job search have you used in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Specify other.
How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد طلبات العمل التي قمت بالتقديم لها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job applications have you made in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد مقابلات العمل التي قبت بها في ال 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job interviews have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

translations.ara: كم عدد عروض العمل التي حصلت عليها خلال الـ 30 يومًا الماضية؟
translations.en: How many job offers have you had in the last 30 days?

questions.label: Do you still have your wage job from the last time we followed up with you?

translations.ara: هل مازلت تشتغل بوظيفتك من آخر متابعة قمنا بها معك؟
translations.en: Do you still have your wage job from the last time we followed up with you?

questions.label: If you left your wage job, on what date did you leave?

translations.ara: إذا تركت وظيفتك بالراتب، في أي تاريخ تركت العمل؟
translations.en: If you left your wage job, on what date did you leave?

questions.label: Do you have a new wage job?

translations.en: Do you have a new wage job?

questions.label: Current Work
How did you hear about this job?

translations.ara: من خلال المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمة

translations.en: How did you hear about this job?

questions.label: If through friends, these people are:

translations.ara: إذا كان من خلال الأصدقاء، فهؤلاء الأشخاص هم:
translations.en: If through friends, these people are:

questions.label: How was the hiring process?

options.label: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: تقديم السيرة الذاتية ومن ثم المقابلة بعد الإحالة للعمل عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: CV and then interview after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل في موقع العمل بعد الاستعلام عنّي
translations.en: Informal meeting with the employer at the work site after making an enquiry

options.label: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

translations.ara: اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي إلى الوظيفة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (إحالتي عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Informal meeting with employer after being referred for the job by a social contact

options.label: Social contact gave me the job directly

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي العمل مباشرة عن طريق جهة اتصال اجتماعي (حصلت على العمل عن طريق شخص يعرفني)
translations.en: Social contact gave me the job directly

options.label: Given the job directly at the work site

translations.ara: تم إعطاءي الوظيفة في موقع العمل مباشرة
translations.en: Given the job directly at the work site

options.label: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

translations.ara: عقد اجتماع غير رسمي مع صاحب العمل بعد إحالتي للعمل من قبل مدرستي جامعتي / كليتي)
translations.en: Had informal meeting with the employer after being referred for the job by my school (university/college).

questions.label: When did you start this job?

translations.en: When did you start this job?

questions.label: What is your firm's or organization's name?

translations.en: What is your firm's or organization's name?

questions.label: In what city is this job located?

translations.ara: في أي مدينة تقع هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: In what city is this job located?

questions.label: What is the most appropriate job desciption?

translations.ara: تحضير و تقديم الطعام (على سبيل المثال مطعم)

translations.en: What is the most appropriate job desciption?

questions.label: Within construction, what is the most appropriate job description?

options.label: Supervisors of construction and extraction workers

translations.en: Supervisors of construction and extraction workers

translations.ara: في مجال البنية، ما هو الوصف الوظيفي الأنسب؟
translations.en: Within construction, what is the most appropriate job description?

questions.label: Within production, what is the most appropriate job description?

translations.ara: في مجال الإنتاج ، ما هو الوصف الوظيفي الأنسب؟
translations.en: Within production, what is the most appropriate job description?

questions.label: What are the terms of this employment?

translations.en: What are the terms of this employment?

questions.label: Specify other.
What is the sector of this job?

translations.en: What is the sector of this job?

questions.label: What type of employer is this job with?

options.label: Joint venture between government and private firm

translations.ara: مشروع مشترك بين الحكومة وشركة خاصة
translations.en: Joint venture between government and private firm

options.label: Joint venture between domestic and foreign firm

translations.ara: مشروع مشترك بين شركة محلية وأجنبية
translations.en: Joint venture between domestic and foreign firm
What type of employer is this job with?

questions.label: How many permanent employees does this firm or organisation have?

translations.ara: كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين لدى هذه الشركة أو المؤسسة؟
translations.en: How many permanent employees does this firm or organisation have?

questions.label: Where do you do this work?

translations.en: Where do you do this work?

questions.label: Specify other.
Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

translations.ara: يرجى تحديد وسيلة المواصلات التي تستخدمها للوصول إلى هذه الوظيفة.
translations.en: Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

questions.label: Specify other.
Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما مدى بعد هذه الوظيفة عن المنزل (بالدقائق)؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

questions.label: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما تكلفة المواصلات من البيت الى العمل؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

questions.label: How many hours do you work in this job on a typical weekday?

translations.ara: كم ساعة تعمل في هذا العمل في اليوم العادي؟
translations.en: How many hours do you work in this job on a typical weekday?

questions.label: How many days do you work in this job in a typical week?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأيام التي تعمل فيها في هذا العمل في أسبوع عادي؟
translations.en: How many days do you work in this job in a typical week?

questions.label: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

translations.ara: ما هو راتبك أو أجرك الشهري لهذه الوظيفة، قبل الضرائب؟
translations.en: What are your monthly earnings for this job, before taxes?

questions.label: What benefits has your employer/firm offered you?

translations.ara: ما هي الفوائد (المزايا) التي قدمها لك صاحب العمل / الشركة؟
translations.en: What benefits has your employer/firm offered you?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did the employer/firm provide you with a work permit?

translations.ara: هل قام صاحب العمل /الشركة بتأمينك بتصريح عمل؟
translations.en: Did the employer/firm provide you with a work permit?

questions.label: What is the status of your work permit?

translations.ara: غير خاص بصاحب العمل و الوظيفة

translations.en: What is the status of your work permit?

questions.label: Are you facing any challenges with this job?

options.label: The job is exhausting and straining

translations.en: The job is exhausting and straining

options.label: The employer is not easy to work with

translations.ara: ليس من السهل التعامل مع صاحب العمل
translations.en: The employer is not easy to work with

options.label: The other employees are not easy to work with

translations.ara: ليس من السهل التعامل مع الموظفين الآخرين
translations.en: The other employees are not easy to work with

options.label: The job doesn't offer enough benefits

translations.en: The job doesn't offer enough benefits

options.label: The skill level is too high

translations.en: The skill level is too high

options.label: The skill level is too low

translations.en: The skill level is too low

options.label: Employer didn't provide me with a work permit

translations.ara: لم يأمن لي صاحب العمل تصريح عمل
translations.en: Employer didn't provide me with a work permit

options.label: I cannot cover transportation costs to work

translations.ara: لا أقدر أن اغطي تكاليف المواصلات للعمل
translations.en: I cannot cover transportation costs to work

options.label: I cannot cover the costs of childcare

translations.ara: لا أقدر أن تكاليف الرعاية على أطفالي
translations.en: I cannot cover the costs of childcare

translations.ara: هل تواجه أي تحديات في هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: Are you facing any challenges with this job?

questions.label: Specify other.
Do you still own your business from the last time we followed up with you?

translations.ara: هل ما زلت تمتلك شركتك أو عملك الماضي من آخر متابعة قمنا بها معك؟
translations.en: Do you still own your business from the last time we followed up with you?

questions.label: On what date did you stop the business?

translations.ara: في أي تاريج وقفت شركتك أو عملك الخاص؟
translations.en: On what date did you stop the business?

questions.label: Do you have a new business that we did not ask you about during the last interview?

translations.ara: هل تملك شركة أو عمل خاص جديد لم نسألك عنه خلال المقابلة السابقة؟
translations.en: Do you have a new business that we did not ask you about during the last interview?

questions.label: Current Business
When did you start this business?

translations.ara: متى بدأت شركتك أو عملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: When did you start this business?

questions.label: In what sector is this business?

translations.ara: في أي قطاع صناعي تقع شركتك أوعملك الخاص هذا؟
translations.en: In what sector is this business?

questions.label: Is this business legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

translations.ara: هل هذا العمل الخاص مسجل رسميا و قانونيا (هل هي مسجلة لضرائب القيمة المضافة (VAT))؟
translations.en: Is this business legally and formally registered (ie. is it registered for Value Added Tax (VAT))?

questions.label: How are you paid in this business?

options.label: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

translations.ara: أدفع لنفسى راتب شهري ثابت من الأرباح الشهرية.
translations.en: I pay myself a fixed wage from the monthly profits.

options.label: I receive money from my customers.

translations.en: I receive money from my customers.

options.label: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.en: I pay myself all of the monthly profits.

translations.ara: كيف تستلم أجورك من هذا العمل؟
translations.en: How are you paid in this business?

questions.label: What was this amount last month?

translations.ara: كم كان هذا المبلغ الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: What was this amount last month?

questions.label: For the previous month...
Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

translations.ara: بالنظر إلى تكاليف راتبك و أية تكاليف أخرى، ما هو إجمالي نفقات عملك في الشهر الماضي؟
translations.en: Considering your wage and any other costs, what were the total expenses of your business last month?

questions.label: What were the total monthly sales of your business? Include sales of services

translations.ara: ما هو إجمالي المبيعات الشهرية لشركتك؟ تشمل مبيعات الخدمات
translations.en: What were the total monthly sales of your business? Include sales of services

questions.label: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits)?

translations.ara: بعد دفع جميع النفقات، ما هو دخل الشركة (الأرباح)؟
translations.en: After paying all expenses, what was the income of the business (the profits)?

questions.label: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

translations.ara: كم عدد الشركات الذي تعمل بفس نطاق عملك والتي تقع في منطقتكم (على بعد خمس دقائق سيراً على الأقدام)؟
translations.en: How many businesses in the same sector of activity as yours operate in your neighbourhood (within five minutes' walk)?

questions.label: Where is your most important competitor located?

options.label: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، ولكن في نفس الحي
translations.en: More than 1km, but within the same neighbourhood

options.label: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city

translations.ara: أكثر من كيلومتر واحد ، في حي مختلف ولكن في نفس المدينة
translations.en: More than 1km, in a different neighbourhood but in the same city
Where is your most important competitor located?

questions.label: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

translations.ara: باستثنائك، كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين في شركتك؟
translations.en: Aside from you, how many permanent employees does your business have?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك بشراء البضائع (مثل عناصر الإنتاج، الأثاث، المعدات) مباشرة من دولة أخرى بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly purchase goods (e.g. production inputs, furniture, equipment) directly from another country?

questions.label: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك ببيع السلع أو الخدمات لمواطني الدول الأجنبية (على سبيل المثال عن طريق تصدير المنتجات، أو عن طريق البيع للسياح/المغتربين في الأردن) بانتظام؟
translations.en: Does your firm regularly sell goods or services to citizens of foreign countries (e.g. by exporting products, or by selling to tourists/expatriates in Jordan)?

questions.label: Did you recieve any form of cash assistance from us?

translations.ara: هل أستلمت مساعدات مالية من قبلنا؟
translations.en: Did you recieve any form of cash assistance from us?

questions.label: Cash Usage
Have you spent any of the cash assistance you received (either some or all of it)?

translations.ara: هل صرفت المبلغ من المالي الذي قمت بسحبه (إما بعضها أو كلها)؟
translations.en: Have you spent any of the cash assistance you received (either some or all of it)?

questions.label: If yes, how much?
In how many days did spend the amount you withdrew?

translations.ara: في كم يوماً صرفت المبلغ الذي سحبته؟
translations.en: In how many days did spend the amount you withdrew?

questions.label: How did you spend the cash?

translations.en: How did you spend the cash?

questions.label: Do you think that the value of the cash transfer was helpful in general?

translations.ara: هل تعتقد أن قيمة المبلغ المالي كان مفيد لك؟
translations.en: Do you think that the value of the cash transfer was helpful in general?

questions.label: Why  was it helpful?
Why was it not helpful?
Who in the household benefitted the most from the cash, why?

translations.ara: أي من افراد اسرتك استفاد من المبلغ المالي؟
translations.en: Who in the household benefitted the most from the cash, why?

questions.label: Household Expenditure Patterns
Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money first on a monthly basis and then on a weekly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: اسأل المشتركين حول كيفية إنفاق أموالهم على أساس شهري. يمكن للمشتركين تقدير الإنفاق هنا.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Ask respondents about how they spend their money first on a monthly basis and then on a weekly basis. Respondents can estimate here.

questions.label: In the last MONTH, how much did your household pay on the following either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

translations.ara: خلال الشر الماضي، كم دفعت أسرتك على الأشياء التالية لك أو لعائلتك أو لأصدقائك أو للآخرين؟ (بالدينار الأردني)
translations.en: In the last MONTH, how much did your household pay on the following either for you, your family, or others? (in JOD)

questions.label: Food and drink
Rent/housing
Electricity/gas
Water
Healthcare
Education
Transportation
Communication (eg. mobile phone credit/internet)

translations.ara: الاتصال (على سبيل المثال ، رصيد الهاتف المحمول / الإنترنت)

questions.label: Debt repayment
Household goods (soap, cleaning, etc)
Coffee, cigarettes, shisha/argeela
Spending on other things
In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

translations.ara: المساعدات المالية عن طريق المنظمات غير الحكومية / المنظمات الدولية

options.label: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: التحويلات من ألأسرة أو ألأصحاب خارج البلد
translations.en: Remittances from family or friends outside of the country

translations.ara: في الأيام السبعة الماضية، ما كان مصدر الدخل الرئيسي للأموال التي أنفقتها؟
translations.en: In the last 7 days, what would you say is the main source of cash you have spent?

questions.label: Specify other.
Refugee Integration
ESO script: This section is on your personal opinions of inclusion in Jordan. There are no right or wrong answers.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذا القسم عن الآراء الشخصية للإندماج في المجتمع الأردني. لا توجد اجابات صحيحة أو خاطئة.
translations.en: ESO script: This section is on your personal opinions of inclusion in Jordan. There are no right or wrong answers.

questions.label: How connected do you feel with Jordan?

options.label: I do not feel a connection at all

translations.ara: لا أشعر بأي ارتباط على الإطلاق
translations.en: I do not feel a connection at all

options.label: I feel a moderately close connection

translations.en: I feel a moderately close connection

options.label: I feel an extremely close connection

translations.en: I feel an extremely close connection
How connected do you feel with Jordan?

questions.label: Thinking about your future, where do you want to live?

options.label: I definitely want to move to another country

translations.ara: أنا بالتأكيد أريد الانتقال إلى بلد آخر
translations.en: I definitely want to move to another country

options.label: I probably want to move to another country

translations.ara: على الأرجح أريد الانتقال إلى بلد آخر
translations.en: I probably want to move to another country

options.label: I am unsure if I want to remain in Jordan or if I want to move to another country

translations.ara: أنا غير متأكد إن كنت أريد البقاء في الأردن أو إن كنت أريد الانتقال إلى بلد آخر
translations.en: I am unsure if I want to remain in Jordan or if I want to move to another country

options.label: I probably want to live in Jordan for the rest of my life

translations.ara: على الأرجح أريد أن أعيش في الأردن لبقية حياتي
translations.en: I probably want to live in Jordan for the rest of my life

options.label: I definitely want to live in Jordan for the rest of my life

translations.ara: أنا بالتأكيد أريد أن أعيش في الأردن لبقية حياتي
translations.en: I definitely want to live in Jordan for the rest of my life

translations.ara: بالتفكير في مستقبلك، أين تريد أن تعيش؟
translations.en: Thinking about your future, where do you want to live?

questions.label: How likely is it that you have as many opportunities to find wage-paying work as a Jordanian?

translations.ara: ما مدى احتمالية حصولك على نفس عدد الفرص لإيجاد عمل رسمي براتب كالذي يحصل عليها الأردنيين؟
translations.en: How likely is it that you have as many opportunities to find wage-paying work as a Jordanian?

questions.label: How likely is it that you would be treated the same as your Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job?

translations.ara: ما مدى احتمال معاملتك بنفس معاملة زملائك الأردنيين في وظيفة مدفوعة الأجر؟
translations.en: How likely is it that you would be treated the same as your Jordanian colleagues in a wage-paying job?

questions.label: In this country, how difficult or easy is it for you to search for a job?

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، ما مدى صعوبة أو سهولة البحث عن وظيفة؟
translations.en: In this country, how difficult or easy is it for you to search for a job?

questions.label: In this country, how difficult or easy is it for you to see a doctor?

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، ما مدى صعوبة أو سهولة زيارة الطبيب؟
translations.en: In this country, how difficult or easy is it for you to see a doctor?

questions.label: In this country, how difficult or easy is it for you to get help for legal problems?

translations.ara: في هذا البلد، ما مدى صعوبة أو سهولة الحصول على المساعدة بخصوص المشاكل القانونية؟
translations.en: In this country, how difficult or easy is it for you to get help for legal problems?

questions.label: Positive Mood
ESO script: This section is on personal perceptions relating to your mood.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذا القسم عن تصوراتك الشخصية المتعلقة بمزاجك.
translations.en: ESO script: This section is on personal perceptions relating to your mood.

questions.label: On a scale of 1 (extremely happy and in a good mood) to 8 (extremely unhappy and in a bad mood), indicate to what extent you have felt emotionally comfortable and happy in the past week.

options.label: 1 (extremely happy and in a good mood)

translations.en: 1 (extremely happy and in a good mood)

options.label: 8 (extremely unhappy and in a bad mood)

translations.en: 8 (extremely unhappy and in a bad mood)

translations.ara: على مقياس من 1 (سعيد للغاية وفي مزاج جيد) إلى 8 (غير سعيد للغاية وفي مزاج سيء) وضح إلى أي مدى شعرت بالراحة النفسية و السعادة خلال الأسبوع الماضي.
translations.en: On a scale of 1 (extremely happy and in a good mood) to 8 (extremely unhappy and in a bad mood), indicate to what extent you have felt emotionally comfortable and happy in the past week.

questions.label: Exit and Follow-up
Do you have a new contact number?

translations.en: Do you have a new contact number?

questions.label: Contact mobile number
Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي أفكار أو أسئلة إضافية لديك لمساعدتنا على تحسين هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

questions.label:
ESO script: 
 
You have been selected to receive 120 JD per month for 3 months to spend specifically on either (a) taking care of your child while you are at work or (b) spending on transportation to and from work.
 
If you stay in this job for at least 3 months, you will get an additional 288 JD one-time payment to assist you with any financial challenges that can help you stay in the job longer.  
 
Our senior cash officers will be in touch with you to inform you about how and when you be receiving your cash assistance. Please wait for their call and do not get in touch with us directly.

translations.ara:
نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف:

لقد تم اختيارك لتلقي 120 دينارًا شهريًا لمدة 3 أشهر لإنفاقها تحديدًا على (أ) رعاية طفلك أثناء تواجدك في العمل أو (ب) الإنفاق على النقل من وإلى العمل.
 
إذا بقيت في هذا العمل لمدة 3 أشهر على الأقل ، فسوف تحصل على مساعدة إضافية قدرها 288 دينارًا أردنيًا لمرة واحدة لمساعدتك في مواجهة أي تحديات مالية يمكن أن تمنعك من البقاء في الوظيفة لفترة أطول.
 
سيتصل بك مسؤولين المساعدات المالية لإعلامكم بكيفية تلقي المساعدة الخاصة بك و التارخ الذي سيتم ذلك. يرجى انتظار مكالمتهم وعدم الاتصال بنا مباشرة.
translations.en:
ESO script: 
 
You have been selected to receive 120 JD per month for 3 months to spend specifically on either (a) taking care of your child while you are at work or (b) spending on transportation to and from work.
 
If you stay in this job for at least 3 months, you will get an additional 288 JD one-time payment to assist you with any financial challenges that can help you stay in the job longer.  
 
Our senior cash officers will be in touch with you to inform you about how and when you be receiving your cash assistance. Please wait for their call and do not get in touch with us directly.

questions.label: This is the end of the form.

translations.ara: This is the end of the form.
translations.en: This is the end of the form.

ESO Script: I will now ask you about the job you were placed in.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن عن الوظيفة التي تم تشغيلك فيها.
translations.en: ESO Script: I will now ask you about the job you were placed in.

questions.label: Are you still employed at this job?

translations.ara: هل مازلت تعمل في هذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: Are you still employed at this job?

questions.label: What are the terms of employment for this job?

translations.ara: ما هي شروط التوظيف لهذه الوظيفة؟
translations.en: What are the terms of employment for this job?

questions.label: Where do you do this job?

translations.en: Where do you do this job?

questions.label: Specify other.
Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

translations.ara: يرجى تحديد وسيلة المواصلات التي تستخدمها للوصول إلى هذه الوظيفة.
translations.en: Please select the mode of transportation you use to get to this job.

questions.label: Specify other.
Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما مدى بعد هذه الوظيفة عن المنزل (بالدقائق)؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how far from home (in minutes) is this job?

questions.label: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

translations.ara: باستخدام هذه الوسيلة، ما تكلفة المواصلات من البيت الى العمل؟
translations.en: Using the mode indicated above, how much does it cost to get to this job?

translations.en: How many hours did you work in this job on a typical weekday last week?

translations.en: How many days did you work in this job in the last week?

questions.label: How much are you being paid in this job per month, excluding benefits? (in JOD). If you have not been paid yet, what is the salary that your employer/firm is offering you?

translations.ara: ما هو راتبك الشهري في هذه الوظيفة، باستثناء الفوائد (المزايا)؟ (بالدينار الأردني). إذا لم يتم الدفع لك بعد، ما هو الراتب الذي يقدمه لك صاحب العمل / الشركة؟
translations.en: How much are you being paid in this job per month, excluding benefits? (in JOD). If you have not been paid yet, what is the salary that your employer/firm is offering you?

translations.ara: ما هي الفوائد (المزايا) التي قدمها لك صاحب العمل / الشركة؟
