Job Quality
ESO script: I will now ask you to rank your opinion on the quality of the job. There is no right or wrong answer.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأطلب منك الآن أن تقييم رأيك حول جودة الوظيفة. ليس هناك أجوبة صحيحة أو خاطئة.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask you to rank your opinion on the quality of the job. There is no right or wrong answer.

questions.label: To what extent do you agree with the following statements (from Disagree very much to Agree very much)

translations.ara: إلى أي مدى توافق على العبارات التالية (من لا أوافق إلى حد كبير إلى أوافق إلى حد كبير)
translations.en: To what extent do you agree with the following statements (from Disagree very much to Agree very much)

questions.label: I feel I am being paid a fair amount for the work I do.

translations.ara: أشعر بأنني أتقاضى أجرًا مناسبًا للعمل الذي أقوم به.
translations.en: I feel I am being paid a fair amount for the work I do.

questions.label: There is really too little chance for promotion on my job.

translations.ara: الفرصة ضئيلة جدًا للترقي في عملي.
translations.en: There is really too little chance for promotion on my job.

questions.label: I am not satisfied with the benefits I receive.

translations.ara: أنا غير راض عن الفوائد (المزايا) التي أحصل عليها.
translations.en: I am not satisfied with the benefits I receive.

questions.label: When I do a good job, I receive the recognition for it that I should receive.

translations.ara: عندما أقوم بعمل جيد، أتلقى تقديرأ مناسباً.
translations.en: When I do a good job, I receive the recognition for it that I should receive.

questions.label: I like the people I work with.

translations.en: I like the people I work with.

questions.label: I sometimes feel my job is meaningless.

translations.ara: أشعر أحيانا أن وظيفتي لا معنى لها.
translations.en: I sometimes feel my job is meaningless.

questions.label: My supervisor is unfair to me.

translations.en: My supervisor is unfair to me.

questions.label: I do not feel that the work I do is appreciated.

translations.ara: لا أشعر أن العمل الذي أقوم به يتم تقديره.
translations.en: I do not feel that the work I do is appreciated.

questions.label: I have too much to do at work.

translations.ara: لدي عبأ كبير جداً من الأعمال التي يجب أن أفعلها في العمل.
translations.en: I have too much to do at work.

translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This section will be used to introduce the employment service and determine whether the firm is willling to take part in the service.

questions.label: INTRODUCTION: Hi –I'm [INSERT NAME HERE] from the International Rescue Committee. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us today. Our organization has launched an employment center that will provide intensive 'match-making services' to connect firms, like yours, with labor from both Jordanians and Syrian refugees as needed. We want to take the time today to ask you a few questions on any labor market needs your firm may have and learn about any job openings you currently have. Our goal is to help your firm by presenting you with the closest labor to match your needs based on high quality data. In order to allow us to maximize the quality of these matches, we will also be asking some questions on firm characterictics. If for any reason you do not want to answer any of our questions, simply let us know and we can move on. However, we will be most appreciative if you can answer our questions, because this will help us to improve the quality of the match-making services that we can offer. This survey will take approximately 60-90 minutes. Our conversation here is private. Your responses to the questions will be used for research purposes only. The researchers will not reveal your name, or any other identifying information, to anyone. I will use the tablet to enter your responses after I ask each question.

translations.ara: مقدمة: مرحبًا ، اسمي [ادخل الأسم هنا] من لجنة الإغاثة الدولية. شكراً لتخصيصك الوقت للتحدث معنا اليوم. لقد أطلقت منظمتنا مركزًا للتوظيف يوفر "خدمات توظيف مكثفة" لربط الشركات، مثل شركتك، بعمالة من الأردنيين واللاجئين السوريين حسب الحاجة. نريد أن نأخذ من وقتك اليوم لنطرح عليك بعض الأسئلة حول احتياجات سوق العمل "العمالة" التي تحتاجها شركتك ومعرفة فرص العمل المتواجدة لديك حالياً. هدفنا هو مساعدة شركتك من خلال تقديم أقرب عمالة مطابقة لاحتياجاتك استنادًا على بيانات عالية الجودة. لتتيح لنا بتحقيق أفضل الجودة لهذه المطابقات، سنطرح بعض الأسئلة حول خصائص الشركة. إذا لم ترغب لأي سبب في الإجابة على أي من أسئلتنا، فما عليك سوى إعلامنا ويمكننا تخطي السؤال. ومع ذلك، سنقدر جداً إذا أمكنك الإجابة عن أسئلتنا، لأن ذلك سيساعدنا على تحسين جودة خدمات المطابقة التي يمكننا تقديمها. سيستغرق هذا الاستبيان من 60-90 دقيقة تقريباً. المحادثة التي سنجريها هنا سرية وخاصة بالمنظمة. سيتم استخدام إجاباتك على الأسئلة لأغراض بحثية فقط. لن يكشف الباحثون عن اسمك أو أي معلومات تعريفية أخرى لأي شخص. سأستخدم الجهاز اللوحي لإدخال إجاباتك بعد أن أطرح كل سؤال.
translations.en: INTRODUCTION: Hi –I'm [INSERT NAME HERE] from the International Rescue Committee. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us today. Our organization has launched an employment center that will provide intensive 'match-making services' to connect firms, like yours, with labor from both Jordanians and Syrian refugees as needed. We want to take the time today to ask you a few questions on any labor market needs your firm may have and learn about any job openings you currently have. Our goal is to help your firm by presenting you with the closest labor to match your needs based on high quality data. In order to allow us to maximize the quality of these matches, we will also be asking some questions on firm characterictics. If for any reason you do not want to answer any of our questions, simply let us know and we can move on. However, we will be most appreciative if you can answer our questions, because this will help us to improve the quality of the match-making services that we can offer. This survey will take approximately 60-90 minutes. Our conversation here is private. Your responses to the questions will be used for research purposes only. The researchers will not reveal your name, or any other identifying information, to anyone. I will use the tablet to enter your responses after I ask each question.

questions.label: Is the firm expecting to have any job openings in the next 12 months?

translations.ara: هل من المتوقع أن يكون لدى الشركة أي فرص عمل خلال 12 شهرًا القادمة؟
translations.en: Is the firm expecting to have any job openings in the next 12 months?

questions.label: Do you agree to be part of this service and offer information on job openings?

translations.ara: هل توافق على أن تكون جزءًا من هذه الخدمة وتقدم معلومات عن فرص العمل؟
translations.en: Do you agree to be part of this service and offer information on job openings?

questions.label: HR Manager Contact Information

translations.ara: معلومات التواصل مع مدير الموارد البشرية

questions.label: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will be collecting the HR manager's contact information here for future follow-up.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك أنك ستقوم بجمع معلومات الاتصال بمدير الموارد البشرية للمتابعة المستقبلية.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will be collecting the HR manager's contact information here for future follow-up.

questions.label: Is the follow-up person the same as the initial contact whose details you provided above?

translations.ara: هل الشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة المستقبلية هو نفس جهة الاتصال الذي قدمت تفاصيلها في الأعلاه؟
translations.en: Is the follow-up person the same as the initial contact whose details you provided above?

questions.label: Follow-up contact first name

translations.ara: الاسم الأول للشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة

questions.label: Follow-up contact last name

translations.ara: الاسم الأخير للشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة

questions.label: Follow-up contact mobile phone number

translations.ara: رقم الهاتف المحمول للشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة

questions.label: Follow-up contact landline

translations.ara: رقم الهاتف الأرضي للشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة

questions.label: Follow-up contact e-mail address

translations.ara: عنوان البريد الإلكتروني للشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة

questions.label: Follow-up contact nationality
Follow-up contact gender
Follow-up contact position within firm

translations.ara: المنصب الوظيفي للشخص الذي سيقوم بالمتابعة داخل الشركة

questions.label: Specify other.
Number of years at this firm

translations.en: Number of years at this firm

questions.label: Number of years in this industry

translations.en: Number of years in this industry

questions.label: Best time to visit or call

translations.en: Best time to visit or call

questions.label: Firm Profile
Instructions for ESSO: Inform the respondents that you will be asking general information on the firm here.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك أنك ستطلب هنا معلومات عامة عن الشركة.
translations.en: Instructions for ESSO: Inform the respondents that you will be asking general information on the firm here.

questions.label: Firm name
Firm National ID
Commercial Registration Number
City
District
SEZ firm?

translations.ara: هل الشركة تابعة للمنطقة الاقتصادية الخاصة؟

questions.label: If so, which SEZ is the firm located in?

options.label: Prince Hussein Bin Abdullah II Industrial Area

translations.ara: منطقة الأمير حسين بن عبدالله الثاني الصناعية
translations.en: Prince Hussein Bin Abdullah II Industrial Area

options.label: King Abdullah II Bin Alhussein Industrial Area

translations.ara: منطقة الملك عبدالله بن الحسين الصناعية
translations.en: King Abdullah II Bin Alhussein Industrial Area

translations.ara: إذا كان الأمر كذلك، فما هي المنطقة الاقتصادية الخاصة التي تقع فيها الشركة؟
translations.en: If so, which SEZ is the firm located in?

questions.label: Date of establishment (Month/Year)
Firm legal status
Specify other.
Labor directorate from where your firm obtains work permits

translations.ara: مديرية العمل التي تحصل منها شركتك على تصاريح العمل
translations.en: Labor directorate from where your firm obtains work permits

questions.label: Firm sector
What is the main product the firm produces?

translations.ara: ما هو المنتج الرئيسي الذي تنتجه الشركة؟
translations.en: What is the main product the firm produces?

questions.label: What is the total number of employees at this firm?

translations.ara: كم عدد الموظفين الاجمالي في هذه الشركة؟
translations.en: What is the total number of employees at this firm?

questions.label: Does your firm export its main product?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتك بتصدير منتجها الرئيسي؟
translations.en: Does your firm export its main product?

questions.label: What is the MAIN region you export to?

translations.ara: ما هي المنطقة الرئيسية التي تقوم بالتصدير إليها؟
translations.en: What is the MAIN region you export to?

questions.label: How many countries do you export to?

translations.ara: كم عدد البلدان التي تصدّر إليها؟
translations.en: How many countries do you export to?

questions.label: What is the MAIN country you export to?

translations.ara: ما هو البلد الرئيسي التي تقوم بالتصدير إليه؟
translations.en: What is the MAIN country you export to?

questions.label: Do you know about the Jordan Compact agreement that the Jordanian government initiated to encourage businesses to hire Syrian refugees?

translations.ara: هل لديك علم عن اتفاقية الميثاق الأردني التي بدأت من الحكومة الأردنية لتشجيع الشركات على توظيف اللاجئين السوريين؟
translations.en: Do you know about the Jordan Compact agreement that the Jordanian government initiated to encourage businesses to hire Syrian refugees?

questions.label: If yes, can you please provide an explanation?

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة نعم، فهل يمكنك أن توضح لنا؟
translations.en: If yes, can you please provide an explanation?

questions.label: Does this firm produce a product within the Rules of Origin (RoO) relaxation?

translations.ara: هل تنتج هذه الشركة منتجًا ضمن تخفيف قواعد المنشأ؟
translations.en: Does this firm produce a product within the Rules of Origin (RoO) relaxation?

questions.label: Do you think that the Jordan Compact represents a good opportunity for your company?

translations.ara: هل تعتقد أن الميثاق الأردني يمثل فرصة جيدة لشركتك؟
translations.en: Do you think that the Jordan Compact represents a good opportunity for your company?

questions.label: Does the firm have any ISO certification?

translations.en: Does the firm have any ISO certification?

questions.label: Does the firm follow any occupational health and well-being standards?

translations.ara: هل تتبع الشركة أي معاييرمهنية للصحة والسلامة؟
translations.en: Does the firm follow any occupational health and well-being standards?

questions.label: In how many different locations does this firm operate in Jordan (including retail outlets, other plants, etc.)

translations.ara: ما هو عدد المواقع المختلفة التي تعمل فيها هذه الشركة في الأردن (بما في ذلك مواقع البيع بالتجزئة، والمصانع الأخرى، وما إلى ذلك)
translations.en: In how many different locations does this firm operate in Jordan (including retail outlets, other plants, etc.)

questions.label: How many full-time employees in total are there across all locations?

translations.ara: ما هو عدد الموظفين بدوام كامل الذين يعملو بالمواقع المختلفة لهذه الشركة؟
translations.en: How many full-time employees in total are there across all locations?

questions.label: Current Labor and Hiring

ESO script: I will now ask about the numbers and types of staff currently working at your firm. We have divided the following questions into three worker categories: professionals, production workers, and service workers.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسأل الآن عن عدد و نوعية الموظفين العاملين في الشركة الان. لقد قسمنا الأسئلة التالية إلى ثلاث فئات من الموظفين: المحترفون ، عمال الإنتاج ، وعمال الخدمات.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask about the numbers and types of staff currently working at your firm. We have divided the following questions into three worker categories: professionals, production workers, and service workers.

questions.label: The job category considered is: Production workers (machine operators, building, cooks)

translations.ara: الفئة الوظيفية التي سيتم مناقشتها: عمال الإنتاج (مشغلي الآلات، البناء، الطباخين)
translations.en: The job category considered is: Production workers (machine operators, building, cooks)

questions.label: What is the average (approximately) age of workers in this category?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط سن العاملين (تقريباً) في هذه الفئة؟
translations.en: What is the average (approximately) age of workers in this category?

questions.label: What is the average number of years that workers in this category have been working at your firm?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​عدد السنوات التي عمل فيها العاملين في هذه الفئة الوظيفية في شركتكم؟
translations.en: What is the average number of years that workers in this category have been working at your firm?

questions.label: What is the average starting monthly salary of an individual being employed by the firm in this category, today? (in JOD)

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​الراتب الشهري للفرد الذي يتم توظيفه من قبل الشركة في هذه الفئة الوظيفية، اليوم؟ (بالدينار الأردني)
translations.en: What is the average starting monthly salary of an individual being employed by the firm in this category, today? (in JOD)

questions.label: What is the average monthly salary of an individual who has been working for about one year at the firm in this category, today?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​الراتب الشهري للفرد الذي عمل بالشركة ما مدته سنة واحدة تقريباً في هذه الفئة الوظيفية، اليوم؟
translations.en: What is the average monthly salary of an individual who has been working for about one year at the firm in this category, today?

questions.label: What is the average level of education for workers in this job category?

translations.ara: ما هو متوسط ​​مستوى التعليم للعاملين في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: What is the average level of education for workers in this job category?

questions.label: What is the total number of payroll employees in this category?

translations.ara: كم إجمالي الموظفين الذين لديهم كشوفات رواتب في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: What is the total number of payroll employees in this category?

questions.label: What is the total number of female payroll employees in this category?

translations.ara: كم إجمالي الموظفات (الإناث) الذين لديهم كشوفات رواتب في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: What is the total number of female payroll employees in this category?

questions.label: How many in this category have permanent (no fixed end date) jobs?

translations.ara: كم عدد الموظفين الدائمين في هذه الفئة الوظيفية (بدون تاريخ انتهاء ثابت)؟
translations.en: How many in this category have permanent (no fixed end date) jobs?

questions.label: How many in this category have temporary (fixed end date) jobs?

translations.ara: كم عدد الموظفين المؤقتين في هذه الفئة الوظيفية (أي يوجد تاريخ انتهاء للعقد)؟
translations.en: How many in this category have temporary (fixed end date) jobs?

questions.label: How many Syrian refugees do you currently employee in this category?

translations.ara: كم عدد اللاجئين السوريين الذين تشغلهم حالياً في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: How many Syrian refugees do you currently employee in this category?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many individuals did you hire for this job category?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهرًا الماضية، كم عدد الأفراد الذين وظفتهم في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many individuals did you hire for this job category?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how was the first contact with the individuals that you hired for this job category? List the most frequent option.

options.label: Through a formal job application form or CV

translations.ara: من خلال استمارة طلب وظيفة رسمية أو سيرة ذاتية
translations.en: Through a formal job application form or CV

options.label: At the gates of your firm

translations.en: At the gates of your firm

options.label: On street corners where workers assemble to wait for work

translations.ara: في زوايا الشوارع حيث يتجمع العمال لانتظار العمل
translations.en: On street corners where workers assemble to wait for work

translations.ara: من خلال الزملاء والعمال والشركات الأخرى
من خلال مدرسة / جامعة مقدم الطلب

options.label: Applicant had worked at the firm in the past and was rehired

translations.ara: كان مقدم الطلب يعمل في الشركة في الماضي وتم توظيفه مجدداً
translations.en: Applicant had worked at the firm in the past and was rehired

options.label: Applicant's CV or application form was in the firm's database and was contacted by the firm

translations.ara: كانت السيرة الذاتية أو نموذج طلب للمقدم موجودة في قاعدة بيانات الشركة وتم الاتصال به من قبل الشركة
translations.en: Applicant's CV or application form was in the firm's database and was contacted by the firm

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كيف كان أول تواصل مع الأفراد الذين عينتهم لهذه الفئة الوظيفية؟ عدد الخيارات الأكثر شيوعا.
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how was the first contact with the individuals that you hired for this job category? List the most frequent option.

questions.label: Specify other.
In the last 12 months, what was the average time, in days, that it took to fill a vacancy in this job category?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، ما هو متوسط ​​الوقت (بالأيام) الذي استغرقته لايجاد موظف بهذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, what was the average time, in days, that it took to fill a vacancy in this job category?

questions.label: How many individuals do you expect to hire in this job category in the next 4 months?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأفراد الذين تتوقعون توظيفهم في هذه الفئة التوظيفية خلال الأربعة أشهر القادمة؟
translations.en: How many individuals do you expect to hire in this job category in the next 4 months?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many individuals did you hire for this job category?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهرًا الماضية، كم عدد الأفراد الذين وظفتهم في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many individuals did you hire for this job category?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how was the first contact with the individuals that you hired for this job category? List the most frequent option.

options.label: Through a formal job application form or CV

translations.ara: من خلال استمارة طلب وظيفة رسمية أو سيرة ذاتية
translations.en: Through a formal job application form or CV

options.label: At the gates of your firm

translations.en: At the gates of your firm

options.label: On street corners where workers assemble to wait for work

translations.ara: في زوايا الشوارع حيث يتجمع العمال لانتظار العمل
translations.en: On street corners where workers assemble to wait for work

translations.ara: من خلال الزملاء والعمال والشركات الأخرى
من خلال مدرسة / جامعة مقدم الطلب

options.label: Applicant had worked at the firm in the past and was rehired

translations.ara: كان مقدم الطلب يعمل في الشركة في الماضي وتم توظيفه مجدداً
translations.en: Applicant had worked at the firm in the past and was rehired

options.label: Applicant's CV or application form was in the firm's database and was contacted by the firm

translations.ara: كانت السيرة الذاتية أو نموذج طلب للمقدم موجودة في قاعدة بيانات الشركة وتم الاتصال به من قبل الشركة
translations.en: Applicant's CV or application form was in the firm's database and was contacted by the firm

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كيف كان أول تواصل مع الأفراد الذين عينتهم لهذه الفئة الوظيفية؟ عدد الخيارات الأكثر شيوعا.
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how was the first contact with the individuals that you hired for this job category? List the most frequent option.

questions.label: Specify other.
In the last 12 months, what was the average time, in days, that it took to fill a vacancy in this job category?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، ما هو متوسط ​​الوقت (بالأيام) الذي استغرقته لايجاد موظف بهذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, what was the average time, in days, that it took to fill a vacancy in this job category?

questions.label: How many individuals do you expect to hire in this job category in the next 4 months?

translations.ara: كم عدد الأفراد الذين تتوقعون توظيفهم في هذه الفئة التوظيفية خلال الأربعة أشهر القادمة؟
translations.en: How many individuals do you expect to hire in this job category in the next 4 months?

questions.label: What is the most important human resources challenge faced by your firm?

translations.ara: عدم وجود التحفيز الكافي في مكان العمل
سوء السلوك (على سبيل المثال ، السلوك العدواني)

options.label: Cost of provision of benefits for employees

translations.en: Cost of provision of benefits for employees

options.label: Challenges with finding the best employee management practices

translations.ara: تحديات إيجاد أفضل الممارسات عند إدارة الموظفين
translations.en: Challenges with finding the best employee management practices

translations.ara: ما هو أهم تحدي للموارد البشرية الذي تواجهه شركتك؟
translations.en: What is the most important human resources challenge faced by your firm?

questions.label: Does your firm offer any training for employees?

translations.ara: هل تقدم شركتكم أي تدريب للموظفين؟
translations.en: Does your firm offer any training for employees?

questions.label: If so, what kind of training does the firm offer?

translations.en: If so, what kind of training does the firm offer?

questions.label: Specify other.
Turnover
ESO script:I will now ask about staff turnover. This will be useful for job matching.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن حول تبديل الموظفين. هذا سيكون مفيداً لمطابقة الوظائف.
translations.en: ESO script:I will now ask about staff turnover. This will be useful for job matching.

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers left the firm?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد الموظفين الذين تركوا الشركة؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers left the firm?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers left as a result of fixed-term or temporary contracts coming to an end?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد العمال الذين غادروا بسبب عقود محددة المدة أو عقود مؤقتة انتهت مدتها؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers left as a result of fixed-term or temporary contracts coming to an end?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers were fired (including the those fired because the being was made redundant)?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد العمال الذين تم تسريحهم (بما في ذلك الأشخاص الذين تم تسريحهم بسبب الزيادة في عدد الموظفين)؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers were fired (including the those fired because the being was made redundant)?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers chose to leave the company (i.e. quit)?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد العمال الذين اختاروا مغادرة الشركة (أي استقالوا)؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers chose to leave the company (i.e. quit)?

questions.label: Search Methods
ESO script: I will now ask you about methods that the firm typically uses to search for employees when recruiting.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن عن الطرق التي تستخدمها الشركة عادةً للبحث عن الموظفين عند التوظيف.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask you about methods that the firm typically uses to search for employees when recruiting.

questions.label: If you have advertised for job vacancies in the last 12 months, which of the following methods did you use to advertise?

translations.ara: إذا كنت قد قمت بالإعلان عن الوظائف الشاغرة خلال الأشهر الـ 12 الماضية ، أي من الطرق التالية استخدمتها للإعلان؟
translations.en: If you have advertised for job vacancies in the last 12 months, which of the following methods did you use to advertise?

questions.label: Have you advertised for a job opening in the last 12 months?

translations.ara: هل قمت بالإعلان عن وظيفة مفتوحة/شاغرة في ال12 شهر الماضيين؟
translations.en: Have you advertised for a job opening in the last 12 months?

questions.label: Employment Promotion Units (EPUs)
Al Rai or other newspapers
Post avertisements outside the building of the business

translations.ara: قمت بوضع إعلانات خارج مبنى الشركة
translations.en: Post avertisements outside the building of the business

questions.label: Tanqeeb or Ankaboot or other online vacancy websites

translations.ara: مواقع التوظيف مثل تنقيب أو أخطبوط أو غيرها
translations.en: Tanqeeb or Ankaboot or other online vacancy websites

questions.label: Recruitment agency/broker
NGO/international organization
Social media (like Facebook)
Referrals from employees
Have you used any other methods for advertising? Is so, please mention here.

translations.ara: هل استخدمت أي طرق أخرى للإعلان؟ إذا استخدمت طرق أخرى، يرجى ذكرها هنا.
translations.en: Have you used any other methods for advertising? Is so, please mention here.

questions.label: When you were advertising jobs in the last 12 months, did you reveal the salary?

translations.ara: عندما كنت تعلن عن وظائف في الأشهر الـ 12 الماضية ، هل كشفت عن الراتب؟
translations.en: When you were advertising jobs in the last 12 months, did you reveal the salary?

questions.label: Did the firm set written tests for applications for professional positions, in the last 12 months?

translations.ara: هل حددت الشركة اختبارات كتابية للتقدم لوظيفة بالمناصب المهنية، خلال الاثني عشر شهرًا الماضية؟
translations.en: Did the firm set written tests for applications for professional positions, in the last 12 months?

questions.label: Did you design the tests yourself or using existing testing services?

translations.ara: هل صممت الاختبارات بنفسك أو استخدمت خدمات اختبار موجودة؟
translations.en: Did you design the tests yourself or using existing testing services?

questions.label: Does the firm ever require candidates to pay a fee (in cash) in order for them to apply for a job?

translations.ara: هل تطلب الشركة من المرشحين دفع رسوم (نقدًا) من أجل تقديم طلب للحصول على وظيفة؟
translations.en: Does the firm ever require candidates to pay a fee (in cash) in order for them to apply for a job?

questions.label: Exit and Follow-up
ESO script: This is the final section before the CV exercise!

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذا هو القسم الأخير قبل قسم السير الذاتية!
translations.en: ESO script: This is the final section before the CV exercise!

questions.label: Please share any job descriptions that you would like to be posted on this employment service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي وصف وظيفي ترغب في نشره على خدمة التوظيف هذه.
translations.en: Please share any job descriptions that you would like to be posted on this employment service.

questions.label: What is the best method to contact you?

translations.ara: ما هي أفضل طريقة للتواصل معك؟
translations.en: What is the best method to contact you?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did you hear about this service before this survey?

translations.ara: هل سمعت عن هذه الخدمة قبل هذا الاستبيان؟
translations.en: Did you hear about this service before this survey?

questions.label: How did you hear about this service?

translations.en: How did you hear about this service?

questions.label: Specify other.
Are you coordinating with any other programs to offer job opportunities for Jordanians and Syrian refugees?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتكم بالتنسيق مع أي برامج أخرى بتوفير فرص عمل للأردنيين واللاجئين السوريين؟
translations.en: Are you coordinating with any other programs to offer job opportunities for Jordanians and Syrian refugees?

questions.label: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي أفكار أو أسئلة إضافية لديك لمساعدتنا على تحسين هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

Job Openings
ESO script: Please provide us with information on your firm's job vacancies so that we can use our job matching services to find you the most suitable employee matches for the job vacancies.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يرجى تزويدنا بمعلومات عن فرص العمل الشاغرة في شركتك حتى نتمكن من استخدام خدمة التوظيف الخاصة بنا لنعثر لك على أنسب الموظفين لشغر هذه الوظائف.
translations.en: ESO script: Please provide us with information on your firm's job vacancies so that we can use our job matching services to find you the most suitable employee matches for the job vacancies.

translations.ara: لكل وظيفة شاغرة، يرجى ذكر ما يلي:

Miniumum years of experience required

Literacy (ability to read and write) required

Firm Ownership
ESO script: In this section, I will ask you some questions on firm ownership.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: في هذا القسم، سأطرح عليك بعض الأسئلة حول ملكية الشركة.
translations.en: ESO script: In this section, I will ask you some questions on firm ownership.

questions.label: What percentage of the firm is...

translations.ara: ما نسب التمليك للشركة مما يلي...
translations.en: What percentage of the firm is...

questions.label: Private, domestically-owned (%)
Private, foreign-owned (%)
Government, state-owned (%)
How many owners does the firm have?

translations.en: How many owners does the firm have?

questions.label: What percentage of the firm does the MAIN owner own?

translations.ara: ما هي نسبة التمليك من قبل المالك الرئيسي للشركة؟
translations.en: What percentage of the firm does the MAIN owner own?

questions.label: Is the MAIN owner also managing the firm?

translations.ara: هل يدير المالك الرئيسي الشركة أيضاً؟
translations.en: Is the MAIN owner also managing the firm?

questions.label: What is the MAIN owner's nationality?

translations.ara: ما هي جنسية المالك الرئيسي للشركة؟
translations.en: What is the MAIN owner's nationality?

questions.label: How many other businesses does the MAIN owner currently own?

translations.ara: كم عدد الشركات الأخرى التي يمتلكها المالك الرئيسي حاليًا؟
translations.en: How many other businesses does the MAIN owner currently own?

questions.label: What is the main sector of the other owned firm?

translations.ara: ما هو القطاع الرئيسي للشركات الأخرى (الذي يمتلكها المالك الرئيسي لهذه الشركة)؟
translations.en: What is the main sector of the other owned firm?

questions.label: Production and Export
Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will ask questions on firm productivity.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك بأنك ستطرح أسئلة حول انتاجية الشركة.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will ask questions on firm productivity.

questions.label: How many types of products does the firm produce in total?

translations.ara: ما عدد أنواع المنتجات التي تنتجها الشركة إجمالاً؟
translations.en: How many types of products does the firm produce in total?

questions.label: What is the firm's annual production quantity for the MAIN product (ton/ piece)?

translations.ara: ما هي كمية الإنتاج السنوية للشركة للمنتج الرئيسي (طن / قطعة)؟
translations.en: What is the firm's annual production quantity for the MAIN product (ton/ piece)?

questions.label: Unit of measure
Specify other.
From how many countries does the firm source its raw material?

translations.ara: ما هو عدد الدول التي تعتبر مصدر للمواد الخام للشركة؟
translations.en: From how many countries does the firm source its raw material?

questions.label: From which country does the firm MAINLY source its raw material?

translations.ara: أي دولة تعتبرها الشركة المصدر الرئيسي للمواد الخام الخاصة بها؟
translations.en: From which country does the firm MAINLY source its raw material?

questions.label: Specify other.
What percentage of this product is sold in Jordan?

translations.ara: كم تبلغ نسبة بيع هذا المنتج في الأردن؟
translations.en: What percentage of this product is sold in Jordan?

questions.label: Do you have plans to export to new countries in the next two years?

translations.ara: هل لديك خطط للتصدير لبلدان جديدة في العامين المقبلين؟
translations.en: Do you have plans to export to new countries in the next two years?

questions.label: If yes, which region is the firm mainly targeting?

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة نعم، ما هي المنطقة التي تستهدفها الشركة بشكل أساسي؟
translations.en: If yes, which region is the firm mainly targeting?

questions.label: If no, what are the challenges preventing the firm from exporting?

options.label: High cost associated with trade (e.g. shipping)

translations.en: High cost associated with trade (e.g. shipping)

options.label: Insufficient infrastructure at firm to compete

translations.ara: بنية غير كافية لا تسمح الشركة أن تنافس
translations.en: Insufficient infrastructure at firm to compete

options.label: Insufficient human capital and skills to compete

translations.ara: عدم كفاية الموارد البشري والمهارات للتنافس
translations.en: Insufficient human capital and skills to compete

options.label: Lack of networks for market access/partnership in Europe

translations.ara: عدم وجود شبكات للوصول إلى الأسواق / الشراكة في أوروبا
translations.en: Lack of networks for market access/partnership in Europe

options.label: Lack of global supply-chain systems at the firm

translations.ara: عدم وجود نظم سلسلة موارد عالمية في الشركة
translations.en: Lack of global supply-chain systems at the firm

options.label: Inability to compete with international products

translations.ara: عدم القدرة على التنافس مع المنتجات العالمية
translations.en: Inability to compete with international products

translations.ara: إذا كان الجواب لا، فما هي التحديات التي تمنع الشركة من التصدير؟
translations.en: If no, what are the challenges preventing the firm from exporting?

questions.label: What is the firm's supplier status with its most important buyer?

translations.ara: من خلال تشجيع العمال داخل الشركة

options.label: By attracting qualified workers from outside the firm

translations.ara: من خلال جذب المؤهلين خارج الشركة
translations.en: By attracting qualified workers from outside the firm

translations.ara: ما هي وضع الشركة كمورد مع مشتريه الأكثر أهمية؟
translations.en: What is the firm's supplier status with its most important buyer?

questions.label: In the past two years, has the firm introduced any new products to the market?

translations.ara: في العامين الماضيين، هل أدخلت الشركة أي منتجات جديدة إلى الأسواق؟
translations.en: In the past two years, has the firm introduced any new products to the market?

questions.label: In the past two years, have you completed any production upgrades on existing products?

translations.ara: في العامين الماضيين، هل انجزت أي تحديثات في الإنتاج على المنتجات الحالية؟
translations.en: In the past two years, have you completed any production upgrades on existing products?

questions.label: In the next two years, do you plan to have any production upgrades (either new or to exitsing products)?

translations.ara: في العامين المقبلين، هل تخطط الشركة للقيام بأي تحديثات على الإنتاج (إما لمنتجات جديدة أو منتجات حالية)؟
translations.en: In the next two years, do you plan to have any production upgrades (either new or to exitsing products)?

questions.label: Management Practices
Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will ask about the firm's staff management practices.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك أنك سوف تطرح أسئلة عن ممارسات إدارة شؤون الموظفين للشركة .
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will ask about the firm's staff management practices.

questions.label: What normally happens when a process problem arises, for example, machinery breakdown, human errors or failures in communication?

translations.ara: لم يتم فعل أي شيء حيال ذلك

options.label: We fix it but do not take further measures.

translations.ara: نحن نقوم بإصلاحه ولكننا لم نتخذ الإجراءات اللازمة للتأكد من عدم حدوثه مرة أخرى
translations.en: We fix it but do not take further measures.

options.label: We fix it and take measures to make sure that it does not happen again.

translations.ara: نقوم بإصلاحه واتخاذ الإجراءات اللازمة للتأكد من عدم حدوثه مرة أخرى.
translations.en: We fix it and take measures to make sure that it does not happen again.

options.label: We fix it and take measures to make sure that it does not happen again and we also have a continuous improvement process to anticipate problems.

translations.ara: نقوم بإصلاحه واتخاذ الإجراءات اللازمة للتأكد من عدم حدوثه مرة أخرى، ولدينا أيضًا عملية تطوير مستمرة لتوقع المشكلات قبل حدوثها.
translations.en: We fix it and take measures to make sure that it does not happen again and we also have a continuous improvement process to anticipate problems.

translations.ara: ما الذي يحدث بالعادة عند ظهور مشكلة تتعلق بإجراءات معينة، على سبيل المثال، انهيار المعدات أو الأخطاء البشرية أو الفشل في التواصل؟
translations.en: What normally happens when a process problem arises, for example, machinery breakdown, human errors or failures in communication?

questions.label: How many production performance indicators are monitored in this establishment (example of indicators: volume, quality)?

options.label: One or two production performance indicators (e.g. volume and quality)

translations.ara: مؤشر أو اثنين من مؤشرات أداء الإنتاج (مثل الحجم والجودة)
translations.en: One or two production performance indicators (e.g. volume and quality)

options.label: More than two production performance indicators

translations.en: More than two production performance indicators

translations.ara: ما هو عدد مؤشرات أداء الإنتاج التي يتم رصدها في هذه المؤسسة (مثال على المؤشرات: الحجم والجودة)؟
translations.en: How many production performance indicators are monitored in this establishment (example of indicators: volume, quality)?

questions.label: How frequently are these production performance indicators collected in this firm?

translations.ara: كم مرة تقوم الشركة بجمع مؤشرات أداء الإنتاج؟
translations.en: How frequently are these production performance indicators collected in this firm?

questions.label: How frequently are production performance indicators shown to firm managers?

translations.ara: كم مرة يتم عرض مؤشرات أداء الإنتاج على مديري الشركة؟
translations.en: How frequently are production performance indicators shown to firm managers?

questions.label: Specify other.
How frequently are production performance indicators shown to workers?

translations.ara: كم مرة يتم عرض مؤشرات أداء الإنتاج على العمال؟
translations.en: How frequently are production performance indicators shown to workers?

questions.label: Specify other.
Where in the building are the production display boards showing output and other production performance indicators located?

options.label: There are no display boards anywhere

translations.ara: لا توجد لوحات عرض في أي مكان
translations.en: There are no display boards anywhere

options.label: They are all located in one place

translations.en: They are all located in one place

options.label: They are located in multiple places

translations.en: They are located in multiple places

translations.ara: في أي مكان بالمبنى يوجد في لوحات عرض الإنتاج التي تبين المخرجات ومؤشرات الأداء الإنتاجية الأخرى الموجودة؟
translations.en: Where in the building are the production display boards showing output and other production performance indicators located?

questions.label: How often are production performance indicators reviewed / adjusted by top or middle managers?

translations.ara: كم مرة يتم فيها مراجعة / تعديل مؤشرات أداء الإنتاج من قبل المديرين من المستوى العالي أو المتوسط؟
translations.en: How often are production performance indicators reviewed / adjusted by top or middle managers?

questions.label: Does this firm use any production performance indicators to compare different teams of employees in the production line, in different shifts, or similar?

translations.ara: هل تستخدم هذه الشركة أي مؤشرات لأداء الإنتاج لمقارنة فرق العمل المختلفة في خط الإنتاج، في نوبات مختلفة، أو ما شابه ذلك؟
translations.en: Does this firm use any production performance indicators to compare different teams of employees in the production line, in different shifts, or similar?

questions.label: What is the timescale of this establishment's production targets for its main product?

options.label: The main focus is on short-term production targets for the main product (less than 1 year).

translations.ara: ينصب التركيز الرئيسي على أهداف الإنتاج قصيرة الأجل للمنتج الرئيسي (أقل من 1 سنة).
translations.en: The main focus is on short-term production targets for the main product (less than 1 year).

options.label: There are short- and long-term (more than 3 years) production targets for the main product, but they are set independently.

translations.ara: هناك أهداف إنتاج قصيرة الأجل وطويلة الأجل (أكثر من 3 سنوات) للمنتج الرئيسي، ولكن يتم تعيينها بشكل مستقل.
translations.en: There are short- and long-term (more than 3 years) production targets for the main product, but they are set independently.

options.label: There are integrated short- and long-term production targets for the main product.

translations.ara: هناك أهداف إنتاج متكاملة قصيرة وطويلة الأجل للمنتج الرئيسي.
translations.en: There are integrated short- and long-term production targets for the main product.

options.label: There are no production targets set for the main product.

translations.ara: لا توجد أهداف إنتاج محددة للمنتج الرئيسي.
translations.en: There are no production targets set for the main product.

translations.ara: ما هو الإطار الزمني لأهداف الإنتاج الخاصة بالشركة لمنتجها الرئيسي؟
translations.en: What is the timescale of this establishment's production targets for its main product?

questions.label: How do you reward this establishment's production target achievement?

options.label: Only top and middle management is rewarded

translations.ara: تتم مكافأة الإدارة العليا والمتوسطة فقط
translations.en: Only top and middle management is rewarded

translations.ara: كيف تكافئ الشركة عندما يتم تحقيق هدف الإنتاج الخاص بها؟
translations.en: How do you reward this establishment's production target achievement?

questions.label: Which of the following best corresponds to the main way that employees are promoted in this establishment?

options.label: Promotions are based solely on individuals' effort and ability

translations.ara: تعتمد الترقيات على جهد الأفراد وقدراتهم فقط.
translations.en: Promotions are based solely on individuals' effort and ability

options.label: Promotions are based partly on individuals' effort and ability, and partly on other factors, such as how long the individual has worked at the firm.

translations.ara: تعتمد الترقيات على جهد الأفراد وقدرتهم بشكل جزئي، وعلى عوامل أخرى، مثل مدة عمل الفرد في الشركة.
translations.en: Promotions are based partly on individuals' effort and ability, and partly on other factors, such as how long the individual has worked at the firm.

options.label: Promotions are based mainly on factors other than individuals' effort and ability, such as how long the individual has worked at the firm.

translations.ara: تعتمد الترقيات بشكل رئيسي على عوامل أخرى غير جهود الأفراد وقدراتهم، مثل مدة عمل الفرد في الشركة.
translations.en: Promotions are based mainly on factors other than individuals' effort and ability, such as how long the individual has worked at the firm.

translations.ara: أي مما يلي يتوافق بشكل أفضل مع الطريقة الرئيسية التي يتم بها ترقية الموظفين في هذه المؤسسة؟
translations.en: Which of the following best corresponds to the main way that employees are promoted in this establishment?

questions.label: Which of the following best corresponds to this firm's main policy when dealing with employees who do not meet expectations in their position?

options.label: They are rarely or never moved from their position.

translations.ara: نادرا ما يتم نقلهم وبالعادة لا يتم نقلهم أبداً من مناصبهم.
translations.en: They are rarely or never moved from their position.

options.label: They usually stay in their position for at least a year before action is taken.

translations.ara: عادة ما يبقون في موقعهم لمدة سنة على الأقل قبل اتخاذ أي إجراء
translations.en: They usually stay in their position for at least a year before action is taken.

options.label: They are rapidly helped and re-trained, and then dismissed if their performance does not improve

translations.ara: تتم مساعدتهم بسرعة وإعادة تدريبهم، ثم يتم استبعادهم إذا لم يتحسن أدائهم.
translations.en: They are rapidly helped and re-trained, and then dismissed if their performance does not improve

translations.ara: أي مما يلي يتوافق بشكل أفضل مع السياسة الرئيسية للشركة عند التعامل مع الموظفين الذين لا يلبون التوقعات التي تفرضها وظيفتهم؟
translations.en: Which of the following best corresponds to this firm's main policy when dealing with employees who do not meet expectations in their position?

questions.label: Does the firm have a reward system for non-Professional/ non-Managerial/ non-Administrative (non-White collar) staff based on performance? [including non-monetary rewards]

translations.ara: هل لدى الشركة نظام مكافأة للموظفين غير المهنيين / غير الإداريين / غير التنفيذيين / (العمال غير المكتبيين) على أساس الأداء؟ [بما في ذلك المكافآت غير النقدية]
translations.en: Does the firm have a reward system for non-Professional/ non-Managerial/ non-Administrative (non-White collar) staff based on performance? [including non-monetary rewards]

questions.label: Does the firm have a reward system for Professional/ Managerial/ Administrative (White collar) staff based on performance? [including non-monetary rewards]

translations.ara: هل لدى الشركة نظام مكافأة للموظفين من الفئة الفنية / الإدارية / التنفيذيين (ذوي الياقات البيضاء / العمال المكتبيين) على أساس الأداء؟ [بما في ذلك المكافآت غير النقدية]
translations.en: Does the firm have a reward system for Professional/ Managerial/ Administrative (White collar) staff based on performance? [including non-monetary rewards]

questions.label: Does the firm publicly identify top performers among staff?

translations.ara: هل تحدد الشركة بشكل علني الموظفين الفئقين من بين العاملين؟
translations.en: Does the firm publicly identify top performers among staff?

questions.label: Profits and Sales

ESO script: I am now going to ask you some questions about the total profits, revenues and costs of the firm for the last 3 financial years. Many managers find it more convenient to answer these questions if they have the firm's financial statements available. If you like, I would be happy to wait while you get a copy of those financial statements now. I will start with the latest year and then go back in time.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سوف أطرح عليك الآن بعض الأسئلة حول إجمالي الأرباح والعائدات وتكاليف الشركة للسنوات المالية الثلاث الأخيرة. يجد العديد من المدراء أنه من الملائم أكثر الإجابة على هذه الأسئلة إذا كانت البيانات المالية للشركة متوفرة لديه. إذا كنت ترغب، سأكون سعيدًا بالانتظار حتى تحصل على نسخة من هذه البيانات المالية الآن. سأبدأ بأحدث عام ثم سأرجع بالوقت تدريجياً.
translations.en: ESO script: I am now going to ask you some questions about the total profits, revenues and costs of the firm for the last 3 financial years. Many managers find it more convenient to answer these questions if they have the firm's financial statements available. If you like, I would be happy to wait while you get a copy of those financial statements now. I will start with the latest year and then go back in time.

questions.label: The year considered is: 2016/2017

translations.ara: السنة التي يجب أخذها بعين الإعتبار: 2016/2017

questions.label: Total annual profit (before tax)
Total annual revenues
Total annual costs
The year considered is: 2015/2016

translations.ara: السنة التي يجب أخذها بعين الإعتبار: 2016/2015

questions.label: Total annual profit (before tax)
Total annual revenues
Total annual costs
The year considered is: 2014/2016

translations.ara: السنة التي يجب أخذها بعين الإعتبار: 2014/2015

questions.label: Total annual profit (before tax)
Total annual revenues
Total annual costs
Would you interview job candidates with the following characteristics for the most commonly available position at your firm?

translations.ara: هل أنت على استعداد لمقابلة أشخاص بالصفات التالية للتوظيف بالوظيفة الأكثر شيوعًا في شركتك؟
translations.en: Would you interview job candidates with the following characteristics for the most commonly available position at your firm?

questions.label: Females
Males
Someone in any of the following age groups (select any age group that you would consider):

translations.ara: شخص في أي من هذه الفئات العمرية (حدد أي فئة عمرية قد فيها تقيلها):
translations.en: Someone in any of the following age groups (select any age group that you would consider):

questions.label: Someone who does not have any previous work experience at all

translations.en: Someone who does not have any previous work experience at all

questions.label: Someone who has not received training in a vocational skill like sewing or brick-laying

translations.ara: شخص لن يحصل عل تدريب في المهارات المهنية مثل الخياطة أو ترتيب الطوب
translations.en: Someone who has not received training in a vocational skill like sewing or brick-laying

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to perform physical work (for example, moving boxes)

translations.ara: شخص لا يقبل بوظيفة تتطلب عمل جسدية (مثل تحريك الصناديق)
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to perform physical work (for example, moving boxes)

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to work night shifts

translations.ara: شخص ليس على استعداد أن يعمل بنوبات ليلية
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to work night shifts

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to reside in a factory

translations.ara: شخص ليس على استعداد للإقامة في سكن تابع للمصنع/الشركة
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to reside in a factory

questions.label: Someone who would not accept a job that required attending an unpaid training session prior to starting work

translations.ara: شخص لا يتقبل بوظيفة تطلبت حضور تدريب غير مدفوع قبل بدء العمل
translations.en: Someone who would not accept a job that required attending an unpaid training session prior to starting work

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to work with the opposite gender.

translations.ara: شخص ليس على استعداد أن يشتغل مع الجنس الاخر.
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to work with the opposite gender.

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to work with other (non-Arab) nationalities.

translations.ara: شخص ليس على استعداد أن يشتغل مع جنسيات أخرى (غير عرب).
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to work with other (non-Arab) nationalities.

questions.label: ESO script: In the next section, I will present you with 30 job seeker CVs. Some of these CVs are based on real individuals and others are hypothetical/made up. Please tell us whether or not you would be willing to interview each of these individuals for the most commonly available position at your firm. You will not have to interview these individuals in reality.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: في القسم التالي ، سأقدم لك مجموعة من 30 سيرة ذاتية للباحثين عن عمل. بعض هذه السير واقعية/حقيقية والبعض الآخر افتراضي. لكل من السير التالية يرجو أخبرنا إذا كنت على استعداد لمقابلة مقابلة هؤلاء الأشخص للتوظيف بالوظيفة الأكثر شيوعًا في شركتكم. لن تضطر على مقابلة هؤلاء الأشخاص في الواقع.
translations.en: ESO script: In the next section, I will present you with 30 job seeker CVs. Some of these CVs are based on real individuals and others are hypothetical/made up. Please tell us whether or not you would be willing to interview each of these individuals for the most commonly available position at your firm. You will not have to interview these individuals in reality.

Instructions for ESO: This section will be used to introduce the employment service and determine whether the firm is willling to take part in the service.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: يقدم هذا القسم خدمة التوظيف ويحدد ما إذا كانت الشركة ترغب في المشاركة في هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: This section will be used to introduce the employment service and determine whether the firm is willling to take part in the service.

questions.label: INTRODUCTION: Hi –I'm [INSERT NAME HERE] from the International Rescue Committee. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us today. Our organization has launched an employment center that will provide intensive 'match-making services' to connect firms, like yours, with labor from both Jordanians and Syrian refugees as needed. We want to take the time today to ask you a few questions on any labor market needs your firm may have and learn about any job openings you currently have. Our goal is to help your firm by presenting you with the closest labor to match your needs based on high quality data. In order to allow us to maximize the quality of these matches, we will also be asking some questions on firm characterictics. If for any reason you do not want to answer any of our questions, simply let us know and we can move on. However, we will be most appreciative if you can answer our questions, because this will help us to improve the quality of the match-making services that we can offer. This survey will take approximately 60-90 minutes. Our conversation here is private. Your responses to the questions will be used for research purposes only. The researchers will not reveal your name, or any other identifying information, to anyone. I will use the tablet to enter your responses after I ask each question.

translations.ara: مقدمة: مرحبًا ، اسمي [ادخل الأسم هنا] من لجنة الإغاثة الدولية. شكراً لتخصيصك الوقت للتحدث معنا اليوم. لقد أطلقت منظمتنا مركزًا للتوظيف يوفر "خدمات توظيف مكثفة" لربط الشركات، مثل شركتك، بعمالة من الأردنيين واللاجئين السوريين حسب الحاجة. نريد أن نأخذ من وقتك اليوم لنطرح عليك بعض الأسئلة حول احتياجات سوق العمل "العمالة" التي تحتاجها شركتك ومعرفة فرص العمل المتواجدة لديك حالياً. هدفنا هو مساعدة شركتك من خلال تقديم أقرب عمالة مطابقة لاحتياجاتك استنادًا على بيانات عالية الجودة. لتتيح لنا بتحقيق أفضل الجودة لهذه المطابقات، سنطرح بعض الأسئلة حول خصائص الشركة. إذا لم ترغب لأي سبب في الإجابة على أي من أسئلتنا، فما عليك سوى إعلامنا ويمكننا تخطي السؤال. ومع ذلك، سنقدر جداً إذا أمكنك الإجابة عن أسئلتنا، لأن ذلك سيساعدنا على تحسين جودة خدمات المطابقة التي يمكننا تقديمها. سيستغرق هذا الاستبيان من 60-90 دقيقة تقريباً. المحادثة التي سنجريها هنا سرية وخاصة بالمنظمة. سيتم استخدام إجاباتك على الأسئلة لأغراض بحثية فقط. لن يكشف الباحثون عن اسمك أو أي معلومات تعريفية أخرى لأي شخص. سأستخدم الجهاز اللوحي لإدخال إجاباتك بعد أن أطرح كل سؤال.
translations.en: INTRODUCTION: Hi –I'm [INSERT NAME HERE] from the International Rescue Committee. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us today. Our organization has launched an employment center that will provide intensive 'match-making services' to connect firms, like yours, with labor from both Jordanians and Syrian refugees as needed. We want to take the time today to ask you a few questions on any labor market needs your firm may have and learn about any job openings you currently have. Our goal is to help your firm by presenting you with the closest labor to match your needs based on high quality data. In order to allow us to maximize the quality of these matches, we will also be asking some questions on firm characterictics. If for any reason you do not want to answer any of our questions, simply let us know and we can move on. However, we will be most appreciative if you can answer our questions, because this will help us to improve the quality of the match-making services that we can offer. This survey will take approximately 60-90 minutes. Our conversation here is private. Your responses to the questions will be used for research purposes only. The researchers will not reveal your name, or any other identifying information, to anyone. I will use the tablet to enter your responses after I ask each question.

questions.label: Is the firm expecting to have any job openings in the next 12 months?

translations.ara: هل من المتوقع أن يكون لدى الشركة أي فرص عمل خلال 12 شهرًا القادمة؟
translations.en: Is the firm expecting to have any job openings in the next 12 months?

translations.en: In how many different locations does this firm operate in Jordan (including retail outlets, other plants, etc.)

questions.label: Profits and Sales

ESO script: I am now going to ask you some questions about the total profits, revenues and costs of the firm for the last 3 financial years. Many managers find it more convenient to answer these questions if they have the firm's financial statements available. If you like, I would be happy to wait while you get a copy of those financial statements now. I will start with the latest year and then go back in time.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سوف أطرح عليك الآن بعض الأسئلة حول إجمالي الأرباح والعائدات وتكاليف الشركة للسنوات المالية الثلاث الأخيرة. يجد العديد من المدراء أنه من الملائم أكثر الإجابة على هذه الأسئلة إذا كانت البيانات المالية للشركة متوفرة لديه. إذا كنت ترغب، سأكون سعيدًا بالانتظار حتى تحصل على نسخة من هذه البيانات المالية الآن. سأبدأ بأحدث عام ثم سأرجع بالوقت تدريجياً.
translations.en: ESO script: I am now going to ask you some questions about the total profits, revenues and costs of the firm for the last 3 financial years. Many managers find it more convenient to answer these questions if they have the firm's financial statements available. If you like, I would be happy to wait while you get a copy of those financial statements now. I will start with the latest year and then go back in time.

questions.label: The year considered is: 2016/2017

translations.ara: السنة التي يجب أخذها بعين الإعتبار: 2016/2017

Total annual revenues
Total annual costs
The year considered is: 2015/2016

questions.label: Total annual profit (before tax)
Total annual revenues
Total annual costs
The year considered is: 2014/2016

questions.label: Total annual profit (before tax)
Total annual revenues
Total annual costs
Production and Export
Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will ask questions on firm productivity.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: أبلغ المشترك بأنك ستطرح أسئلة حول انتاجية الشركة.
translations.en: Instructions for ESO: Inform the respondent that you will ask questions on firm productivity.

questions.label: How many types of products does the firm produce in total?

translations.ara: ما عدد أنواع المنتجات التي تنتجها الشركة إجمالاً؟
translations.en: How many types of products does the firm produce in total?

questions.label: What is the firm's annual production quantity for the MAIN product (ton/ piece)?

translations.ara: ما هي كمية الإنتاج السنوية للشركة للمنتج الرئيسي (طن / قطعة)؟
translations.en: What is the firm's annual production quantity for the MAIN product (ton/ piece)?

questions.label: Unit of measure
Specify other.
From how many countries does the firm source its raw material?

translations.ara: ما هو عدد الدول التي تعتبر مصدر للمواد الخام للشركة؟
translations.en: From how many countries does the firm source its raw material?

questions.label: From which country does the firm MAINLY source its raw material?

translations.ara: أي دولة تعتبرها الشركة المصدر الرئيسي للمواد الخام الخاصة بها؟
translations.en: From which country does the firm MAINLY source its raw material?

questions.label: Specify other.
What percentage of this product is sold in Jordan?

translations.ara: كم تبلغ نسبة بيع هذا المنتج في الأردن؟
translations.en: What percentage of this product is sold in Jordan?

questions.label: Tell me about the product that is sold in other countries. Do you export the product?

translations.ara: أخبرني عن المنتج الذي يتم بيعه في بلدان أخرى. هل تقوم بتصدير المنتج؟
translations.en: Tell me about the product that is sold in other countries. Do you export the product?

questions.label: How many countries do you export to?

translations.ara: كم عدد البلدان التي تصدّر إليها؟
translations.en: How many countries do you export to?

questions.label: What is the MAIN region you export to?

translations.ara: ما هي المنطقة الرئيسية التي تقوم بالتصدير إليها؟
translations.en: What is the MAIN region you export to?

questions.label: What is the MAIN country you export to?

translations.ara: ما هو البلد الرئيسي التي تقوم بالتصدير إليه؟
translations.en: What is the MAIN country you export to?

questions.label: Do you have plans to expand to new countries in the next two years?

translations.ara: هل لديك خطط للتوسع في بلدان جديدة في العامين المقبلين؟
translations.en: Do you have plans to expand to new countries in the next two years?

questions.label: If yes, which region is the firm mainly targeting?

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة نعم، ما هي المنطقة التي تستهدفها الشركة بشكل أساسي؟
translations.en: If yes, which region is the firm mainly targeting?

questions.label: If no, what are the challenges preventing the firm from exporting?

options.label: High cost associated with trade (e.g. shipping)

translations.en: High cost associated with trade (e.g. shipping)

options.label: Insufficient infrastructure at firm to compete

translations.ara: بنية غير كافية لا تسمح الشركة أن تنافس
translations.en: Insufficient infrastructure at firm to compete

options.label: Insufficient human capital and skills to compete

translations.ara: عدم كفاية الموارد البشري والمهارات للتنافس
translations.en: Insufficient human capital and skills to compete

options.label: Lack of networks for market access/partnership in Europe

translations.ara: عدم وجود شبكات للوصول إلى الأسواق / الشراكة في أوروبا
translations.en: Lack of networks for market access/partnership in Europe

options.label: Lack of global supply-chain systems at the firm

translations.ara: عدم وجود نظم سلسلة موارد عالمية في الشركة
translations.en: Lack of global supply-chain systems at the firm

options.label: Inability to compete with international products

translations.ara: عدم القدرة على التنافس مع المنتجات العالمية
translations.en: Inability to compete with international products

translations.ara: إذا كان الجواب لا، فما هي التحديات التي تمنع الشركة من التصدير؟
translations.en: If no, what are the challenges preventing the firm from exporting?

questions.label: What is the firm's supplier status with its most important buyer?

translations.ara: من خلال تشجيع العمال داخل الشركة

options.label: By attracting qualified workers from outside the firm

translations.ara: من خلال جذب المؤهلين خارج الشركة
translations.en: By attracting qualified workers from outside the firm

translations.ara: ما هي وضع الشركة كمورد مع مشتريه الأكثر أهمية؟
translations.en: What is the firm's supplier status with its most important buyer?

questions.label: In the past two years, has the firm introduced any new products to the market?

translations.ara: في العامين الماضيين، هل أدخلت الشركة أي منتجات جديدة إلى الأسواق؟
translations.en: In the past two years, has the firm introduced any new products to the market?

questions.label: In the past two years, have you completed any production upgrades on existing products?

translations.ara: في العامين الماضيين، هل انجزت أي تحديثات في الإنتاج على المنتجات الحالية؟
translations.en: In the past two years, have you completed any production upgrades on existing products?

questions.label: In the next two years, do you plan to have any production upgrades (either new or to exitsing products)?

translations.ara: في العامين المقبلين، هل تخطط الشركة للقيام بأي تحديثات على الإنتاج (إما لمنتجات جديدة أو منتجات حالية)؟
translations.en: In the next two years, do you plan to have any production upgrades (either new or to exitsing products)?

questions.label: Turnover
ESO script:I will now ask about staff turnover. This will be useful for job matching.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن حول تبديل الموظفين. هذا سيكون مفيداً لمطابقة الوظائف.
translations.en: ESO script:I will now ask about staff turnover. This will be useful for job matching.

questions.label: How many total workers did you have on March 1, 2018?

translations.ara: كم كان إجمالي الموظفين لديك في 1 مارس، 2018؟
translations.en: How many total workers did you have on March 1, 2018?

questions.label: How many total workers did you have on April 1, 2018?

translations.ara: كم كان إجمالي الموظفين لديك في 1 إبريل، 2018؟
translations.en: How many total workers did you have on April 1, 2018?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers left the firm?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد الموظفين الذين تركوا الشركة؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers left the firm?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers left as a result of fixed-term or temporary contracts coming to an end?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد العمال الذين غادروا بسبب عقود محددة المدة أو عقود مؤقتة انتهت مدتها؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers left as a result of fixed-term or temporary contracts coming to an end?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers were fired (including the those fired because the being was made redundant)?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد العمال الذين تم تسريحهم (بما في ذلك الأشخاص الذين تم تسريحهم بسبب الزيادة في عدد الموظفين)؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers were fired (including the those fired because the being was made redundant)?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many workers chose to leave the company (i.e. quit)?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد العمال الذين اختاروا مغادرة الشركة (أي استقالوا)؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many workers chose to leave the company (i.e. quit)?

questions.label: Search Methods
ESO script: I will now ask you about methods that the firm typically uses to search for employees when recruiting.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن عن الطرق التي تستخدمها الشركة عادةً للبحث عن الموظفين عند التوظيف.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask you about methods that the firm typically uses to search for employees when recruiting.

questions.label: If you have advertised for job vacancies in the last 12 months, which of the following methods did you use to advertise?

translations.ara: إذا كنت قد قمت بالإعلان عن الوظائف الشاغرة خلال الأشهر الـ 12 الماضية ، أي من الطرق التالية استخدمتها للإعلان؟
translations.en: If you have advertised for job vacancies in the last 12 months, which of the following methods did you use to advertise?

questions.label: Employment Promotion Units (EPUs)
Al Rai or other newspapers
Post avertisements outside the building of the business

translations.ara: قمت بوضع إعلانات خارج مبنى الشركة
translations.en: Post avertisements outside the building of the business

questions.label: Tanqeeb or Ankaboot or other online vacancy websites

translations.ara: مواقع التوظيف مثل تنقيب أو أخطبوط أو غيرها
translations.en: Tanqeeb or Ankaboot or other online vacancy websites

questions.label: Recruitment agency/broker
NGO/international organization
Have you used any other methods for advertising? Is so, please mention here.

translations.ara: هل استخدمت أي طرق أخرى للإعلان؟ إذا استخدمت طرق أخرى، يرجى ذكرها هنا.
translations.en: Have you used any other methods for advertising? Is so, please mention here.

questions.label: When you were advertising jobs in the last 12 months, did you reveal the salary?

translations.ara: عندما كنت تعلن عن وظائف في الأشهر الـ 12 الماضية ، هل كشفت عن الراتب؟
translations.en: When you were advertising jobs in the last 12 months, did you reveal the salary?

questions.label: Did the firm set written tests for applications for professional positions, in the last 12 months?

translations.ara: هل حددت الشركة اختبارات كتابية للتقدم لوظيفة بالمناصب المهنية، خلال الاثني عشر شهرًا الماضية؟
translations.en: Did the firm set written tests for applications for professional positions, in the last 12 months?

questions.label: Did you design the tests yourself or using existing testing services?

translations.ara: هل صممت الاختبارات بنفسك أو استخدمت خدمات اختبار موجودة؟
translations.en: Did you design the tests yourself or using existing testing services?

questions.label: Does the firm ever require candidates to pay a fee (in cash) in order for them to apply for a job?

translations.ara: هل تطلب الشركة من المرشحين دفع رسوم (نقدًا) من أجل تقديم طلب للحصول على وظيفة؟
translations.en: Does the firm ever require candidates to pay a fee (in cash) in order for them to apply for a job?

questions.label: Hiring

ESO script: I will now ask about job applicants and hires in the last year. These questions will repeat for the 4 job categories: professionals, client service staff, production workers, and support services staff.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسأل الآن عن المتقدمين للوظائف والتعيينات في العام الماضي. سوف تتكرر هذه الأسئلة لفئات العمل الأربعة: المهنيين، وموظفي خدمة العملاء، وعمال الإنتاج، وموظفي خدمات الدعم.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask about job applicants and hires in the last year. These questions will repeat for the 4 job categories: professionals, client service staff, production workers, and support services staff.

questions.label: The job category considered is: Professionals (management, administrators, lawyers, engineers)

translations.ara: الفئة الوظيفية التي سيتم مناقشتها هي: المهنيين (الإداريين، التنفيذيين، المحاميين، المهندسين)
translations.en: The job category considered is: Professionals (management, administrators, lawyers, engineers)

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many individuals did you hire for this job category?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهرًا الماضية، كم عدد الأفراد الذين وظفتهم في هذه الفئة الوظيفية؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many individuals did you hire for this job category?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how many applicants applied to positions in this job category on average?

translations.ara: خلال 12 شهراً الماضية، كم عدد المتقدمين بهذه الفئة الوظيفية تقريبا؟
translations.en: In the last 12 months, how many applicants applied to positions in this job category on average?

questions.label: In the last 12 months, how was the first contact with the individuals that you hired for this job category? List the most frequent option.

options.label: Through a formal job application form or CV

translations.ara: من خلال استمارة طلب وظيفة رسمية أو سيرة ذاتية
translations.en: Through a formal job application form or CV

questions.label: Specify other.
Firm Outreach and Challenges
ESO script: I will now ask about any community outreach the firm is performing and any challenges the firm is facing that we can possibly help with.

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: سأسألك الآن عن أي توعية مجتمعية تقوم بها الشركة وأية تحديات تواجه الشركة والتي من الممكن أن نساعدك بها.
translations.en: ESO script: I will now ask about any community outreach the firm is performing and any challenges the firm is facing that we can possibly help with.

questions.label: Have you ever done outreach specifically targeted at Syrian refugees? Outreach can include free training programs, food provision, Ramadan gifts, etc.

translations.ara: هل سبق لشركتكم أن نفذت حملات توعية تستهدف اللاجئين السوريين؟ يمكن أن تشمل التوعية برامج تدريب مجانية، توفير الطعام، هدايا رمضان، إلخ.
translations.en: Have you ever done outreach specifically targeted at Syrian refugees? Outreach can include free training programs, food provision, Ramadan gifts, etc.

questions.label: Are you coordinating with any other programs to offer job opportunities for Jordanians and Syrian refugees?

translations.ara: هل تقوم شركتكم بالتنسيق مع أي برامج أخرى بتوفير فرص عمل للأردنيين واللاجئين السوريين؟
translations.en: Are you coordinating with any other programs to offer job opportunities for Jordanians and Syrian refugees?

questions.label: What challenges do you face that the employment service may be able to help with?

options.label: Cost of provision of benefits for employees

translations.en: Cost of provision of benefits for employees

options.label: Challenges with finding the best employee management practices

translations.ara: تحديات إيجاد أفضل الممارسات عند إدارة الموظفين
translations.en: Challenges with finding the best employee management practices

translations.ara: ما هي التحديات التي تواجهها والتي من الممكن أن تساعدك بها خدمة التوظيف؟
translations.en: What challenges do you face that the employment service may be able to help with?

questions.label: Specify other.
Exit and Follow-up
ESO script: This is the final section before the CV exercise!

translations.ara: نص مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: هذا هو القسم الأخير قبل قسم السير الذاتية!
translations.en: ESO script: This is the final section before the CV exercise!

questions.label: Please share any job descriptions that you would like to be posted on this employment service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي وصف وظيفي ترغب في نشره على خدمة التوظيف هذه.
translations.en: Please share any job descriptions that you would like to be posted on this employment service.

questions.label: What is the best method to contact you?

translations.ara: ما هي أفضل طريقة للتواصل معك؟
translations.en: What is the best method to contact you?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did you hear about this service before this survey?

translations.ara: هل سمعت عن هذه الخدمة قبل هذا الاستبيان؟
translations.en: Did you hear about this service before this survey?

questions.label: How did you hear about this service?

translations.en: How did you hear about this service?

questions.label: Specify other.
Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

translations.ara: يرجى مشاركة أي أفكار أو أسئلة إضافية لديك لمساعدتنا على تحسين هذه الخدمة.
translations.en: Please share any additional thoughts or questions you have to help us improve this service.

questions.label: Interview end time
Would you interview job candidates with the following characteristics for the most commonly available position at your firm?

translations.ara: هل أنت على استعداد لمقابلة أشخاص بالصفات التالية للتوظيف بالوظيفة الأكثر شيوعًا في شركتك؟
translations.en: Would you interview job candidates with the following characteristics for the most commonly available position at your firm?

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to work night shifts

translations.ara: شخص ليس على استعداد أن يعمل بنوبات ليلية
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to work night shifts

questions.label: Someone who is not willing to reside in a factory

translations.ara: شخص ليس على استعداد للإقامة في سكن تابع للمصنع/الشركة
translations.en: Someone who is not willing to reside in a factory

questions.label: Someone who has no experience working in a factory

translations.ara: شخص لا يمتلك خبرة بالعمل في المصانع
translations.en: Someone who has no experience working in a factory

questions.label: Someone who does not have any previous work experience at all

translations.en: Someone who does not have any previous work experience at all

questions.label: Someone who does not have experience doing manual work (for example, work as a labourer)

translations.ara: شخص لا يمتلك خبرة بالعمل اليدوي (على سبيل المثال، العمل كعامل)
translations.en: Someone who does not have experience doing manual work (for example, work as a labourer)

questions.label: Someone who does not have experience doing clerical or administrative work (for example, work as a secretary)

translations.ara: شخص لا يمتلك خبرة بالعمل الكتابي أو الإداري (على سبيل المثال، العمل بالسكرتاريا): لا
translations.en: Someone who does not have experience doing clerical or administrative work (for example, work as a secretary)

questions.label: Someone who does not have experience doing professional work (for example, work as a qualified accountant)

translations.ara: شخص لا يمتلك خبرة بالعمل المهني (على سبيل المثال، العمل كمحاسب مؤهل): نعم
translations.en: Someone who does not have experience doing professional work (for example, work as a qualified accountant)

questions.label: Someone who does not have experience managing other employees (for example, as a supervisor)

translations.ara: يمتلك هذا المرشح خبرة بإدارة الموظفين الآخرين (على سبيل المثال، كمشرف): نعم
translations.en: Someone who does not have experience managing other employees (for example, as a supervisor)

questions.label: Someone who has not received training in a vocational skill like sewing or brick-laying

translations.ara: شخص لن يحصل عل تدريب في المهارات المهنية مثل الخياطة أو ترتيب الطوب
translations.en: Someone who has not received training in a vocational skill like sewing or brick-laying
