questions.label: ESO ID
Type of follow-up
Interview date
Interview start time
Has your firm hired any Syrian refugees since the last time we spoke to you?

translations.ara: هل وظفت شركتكم أي لاجئ سوري منذ آخر مرة تحدثنا معاك؟
translations.en: Has your firm hired any Syrian refugees since the last time we spoke to you?

questions.label: Refugee Integration

ESO script: Imagine that you have hired or are about to hire a person for a low- skilled job. You have the option of choosing Jordanian or a Syrian refugee. Both have exactly the same education level, experience, and qualifications for the job. Answer the following questions with this scenario in mind. There is no right or wrong answer.

translations.ara: تعليمات مسؤول خدمات التوظيف: تخيل أنك قد وظفت أو على وشك توظيف شخص لوظيفة منخفضة المهارات. لديك خيار اختيار أردني أو لاجئ سوري. كلاهما لديهما نفس المستوى التعليمي، والخبرة، والمؤهلات اللازمة لهذا المنصب. أجب عن الأسئلة التالية مع وضع هذا السيناريو في عين الاعتبار. ليس هنالك أجوبة صحيحة أو خاطئة.
translations.en: ESO script: Imagine that you have hired or are about to hire a person for a low- skilled job. You have the option of choosing Jordanian or a Syrian refugee. Both have exactly the same education level, experience, and qualifications for the job. Answer the following questions with this scenario in mind. There is no right or wrong answer.

questions.label: We know the same amount about both people's qualifications for the job.

translations.ara: نحن نعرف نفس المقدار عن مؤهلات كل من الموظفين (السوري والأردني) لهذا المنصب.
translations.en: We know the same amount about both people's qualifications for the job.

questions.label: The Syrian cares more about his job than the Jordanian.

translations.ara: يهتم السوري بعمله أكثر من الأردني.
translations.en: The Syrian cares more about his job than the Jordanian.

questions.label: There is no risk that employee cooperation within the firm will deteriorate by hiring the Syrian.

translations.ara: لا يوجد خطر بتدهور تعاون الموظفين داخل الشركة بحال تم توظيف السوري.
translations.en: There is no risk that employee cooperation within the firm will deteriorate by hiring the Syrian.

Introduction

Hello, my name is ____________ and I am working for IRC Jordan. We are interviewing job seekers that received cash assistance from Project Match/ IRC Jordan. We would like to ask you some questions to find out if you are satisfied with our services so far and to understand ways to improve our service delivery. What you will say will be kept confidential and will not be revealed to any other group. This survey will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete.

translations.ara: "مرحباً ، اسمي ____________ ، وأعمل لدى اللجنة الدولية للاغاثة . نحن نجري مقابلات مع الباحثين عن العمل الذين تلقوا مساعدة نقدية من مشروع التشبيك من اللجنة الدولية للاغاثة . نود أن نطرح عليك بعض الأسئلة لمعرفة ما إذا كنت راضيًا عن خدماتنا حتى الآن حتى نتمكن من تحسين خدماتنا. سوف يتم الحفاظ على سرية ما ستقوله ولن يتم الكشف عنه لأي مجموعة أخرى. سيستغرق هذا الاستبيان من 20 - 30 دقيقة حتى يكتمل."
translations.en: Hello, my name is ____________ and I am working for IRC Jordan. We are interviewing job seekers that received cash assistance from Project Match/ IRC Jordan. We would like to ask you some questions to find out if you are satisfied with our services so far and to understand ways to improve our service delivery. What you will say will be kept confidential and will not be revealed to any other group. This survey will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete.

questions.label: During the distribution, I noticed tensions between the beneficaries and the project staff.

options.label: Don't know / don't want to answer

translations.en: Don't know / don't want to answer

translations.ara: خلال التوزيع لاحظت توترات بين المستفيدين و موظفين المشروع
translations.en: During the distribution, I noticed tensions between the beneficaries and the project staff.

questions.label: ATM Card
How did you received the cash assistance?

translations.en: How did you received the cash assistance?

questions.label: Generally, were you satisfied with the method in which the cash was paid (ATM Card)?

translations.ara: بشكل عام ، هل أنت راضٍ أو غير راضٍ عن الطريقة التي يتم بها دفع النقود (بطاقة الصراف الآلي)
translations.en: Generally, were you satisfied with the method in which the cash was paid (ATM Card)?

questions.label: What method would you prefer?
Specify other.
Were you informed when the ATM Card was charged?

translations.ara: هل تم إبلاغك عند شحن بطاقة الصراف الآلي؟
translations.en: Were you informed when the ATM Card was charged?

questions.label: Did you withdraw cash from the ATM Card?

translations.ara: هل قمت بسحب النقد من بطاقة الصراف الآلي؟
translations.en: Did you withdraw cash from the ATM Card?

questions.label: If not, why not?
If yes, how much did you withdraw?

translations.ara: إذا كان الجواب بنعم كم كان المبلغ المسحوب؟
translations.en: If yes, how much did you withdraw?

questions.label: Was the amount in the ATM Card the same as what was shared with you by the project staff?

translations.ara: هو المبلغ الموجود في بطاقة الصراف الآلي مشابهة لما تم مشاركته معك من قبل موظفي المشروع خلال عملية التوزيع؟
translations.en: Was the amount in the ATM Card the same as what was shared with you by the project staff?

questions.label: How long does it take you to reach the ATM bank machine (in minutes)?

translations.ara: كم من الوقت أستغرقت الوصول إلى جهاز الصرف الآلي (في دقائق)؟
translations.en: How long does it take you to reach the ATM bank machine (in minutes)?

questions.label: Did you face any difficulties in reaching the ATM bank machines after recharging the ATM cards?

translations.ara: هل واجهتك أي صعوبات في الوصول إلى أجهزة الصراف الآلي؟
translations.en: Did you face any difficulties in reaching the ATM bank machines after recharging the ATM cards?

questions.label: If yes, what was the problem?

options.label: Too far from where you live

translations.ara: بعيدا جدا عن المكان الذي تعيش فيه
translations.en: Too far from where you live

options.label: Too expensive to get to the bank (transportation)

translations.en: Too expensive to get to the bank (transportation)

options.label: You did not know where the bank was

translations.ara: كنت لا تعرف من أين كان البنك
translations.en: You did not know where the bank was

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة بنعم ، فما هي المشكلة؟
translations.en: If yes, what was the problem?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did the staff distribute an ATM card withdrawal guidance pamphlet alongside the explanation?

translations.ara: هل قام موظفين بتوزيع كتيب إرشادات سحب النقود من بطاقة الصراف الآلي ؟
translations.en: Did the staff distribute an ATM card withdrawal guidance pamphlet alongside the explanation?

questions.label: If yes, did the pamphlet help you understand how to withdraw the cash from the ATM Card?

options.label: No I was not able to understand pamphlet

translations.ara: لا لم أتمكن من فهم الكتيب
translations.en: No I was not able to understand pamphlet

options.label: No I already know how to use ATM

translations.ara: لا أعرف بالفعل كيفية استخدام أجهزة الصراف الآلي
translations.en: No I already know how to use ATM

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة نعم ، هل ساعدك الكتيب على فهم كيفية سحب النقد من بطاقة الصراف الآلي؟
translations.en: If yes, did the pamphlet help you understand how to withdraw the cash from the ATM Card?

questions.label: Did you face any difficulties in using the ATM machines the ATM cards?

translations.ara: هل واجهت أي صعوبات في استخدام أجهزة الصرافي؟
translations.en: Did you face any difficulties in using the ATM machines the ATM cards?

questions.label: If yes, what was the problem?

options.label: Don't know how to use the cash card machine

translations.ara: لا تعرف كيفية استخدام ماكينة البطاقات النقدية
translations.en: Don't know how to use the cash card machine

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة بنعم ، فما هي المشكلة؟
translations.en: If yes, what was the problem?

questions.label: Specify other.
Did you feel safe at the bank locaton while withdrawing the cash?

translations.ara: هل شعرت بالأمان في البنك أثناء سحب النقود؟
translations.en: Did you feel safe at the bank locaton while withdrawing the cash?

questions.label: Why was the bank not at safe place?

translations.ara: لماذا لم تشعر بالامان في البك؟
translations.en: Why was the bank not at safe place?

questions.label: Accountability
Did you have to pay anyone or to give a favour to anyone to receive your cash ?

translations.ara: هل اضطررت إلى دفع أي مبلغ مالي او عيني لأي شخص لتتلقي المساعدة المالية
translations.en: Did you have to pay anyone or to give a favour to anyone to receive your cash ?

questions.label: If yes, to whom did you pay?

translations.ara: إذا كانت الإجابة بنعم ، لمن دفعت؟ وكم كم؟
translations.en: If yes, to whom did you pay?

questions.label: How much did you pay?
Do you feel the programme staff treats you respectfully?

translations.ara: هل تشعر أن موظفي البرنامج يتعاملون معك باحترام؟
translations.en: Do you feel the programme staff treats you respectfully?

questions.label: In case you have any question about the program/ATM, do you know who to contact?

translations.ara: في حال كان لديك أي سؤال حول البرنامج / بطاقات الصراف الآلي، هل تعرف من عليك الاتصال به؟
translations.en: In case you have any question about the program/ATM, do you know who to contact?

questions.label: Who should you contact?
Were you informed about the complaint phone number?

translations.ara: هل تم اعلامك من قبل موظفينا على الية او رقم الشكاوي؟
translations.en: Were you informed about the complaint phone number?

questions.label: Do you have complaints and need to use the complaint phone number?

translations.ara: هل لديك اي شكوى وبحاجة لأستخدام رقم الشكاوي؟
translations.en: Do you have complaints and need to use the complaint phone number?

questions.label: Why would you not use the complaint phone number?

translations.en: Why would you not use the complaint phone number?

questions.label: Did you contact the complaints phone number?

translations.ara: هل قمت بالاتصال برقم هاتف الشكاوى؟
translations.en: Did you contact the complaints phone number?

questions.label: Did you find an answer to your complaint?

translations.en: Did you find an answer to your complaint?

questions.label: Were you satisfied with the answer?

translations.en: Were you satisfied with the answer?

questions.label: How much time (in hours) did it take for IRC Jordan staff to resolve your complaint?

translations.ara: ما هو الوقت (بالساعات) الذي استغرقه موظفو اللجنة الدولية للاغاثة لحل مشكلتك؟
translations.en: How much time (in hours) did it take for IRC Jordan staff to resolve your complaint?

questions.label: Cash Sensitivity
Did you experience any risks to your safety as a result of receiving the cash?

translations.ara: هل واجهت أي مخاطر\ مشاكل هددت سلامتك نتيجة لاستلامتك المساعدة المالية؟
translations.en: Did you experience any risks to your safety as a result of receiving the cash?

questions.label: What safety risks did you face?

translations.ara: ما هي مخاطر السلامة التي واجهتها؟
translations.en: What safety risks did you face?

questions.label: Where did you face those risks?

translations.en: Where did you face those risks?

questions.label: Did you observe any dispute or tension in your household because of the cash you received?

translations.ara: هل لاحظت أي نزاع أو توتر في منزلك بسبب المبالغ النقدية التي تلقيتها؟
translations.en: Did you observe any dispute or tension in your household because of the cash you received?

questions.label: Did the cash you recieved impact you or your family negatively or positively?

translations.ara: هل أثر استلامك المال عليك أو على عائلتك سلبيا أو ايجابيا؟
translations.en: Did the cash you recieved impact you or your family negatively or positively?

questions.label: How did it impact you or your family negatively?

translations.en: How did it impact you or your family negatively?

questions.label: How did it impact you or your family positively?

translations.en: How did it impact you or your family positively?

questions.label: Thank you for your time.
